script

;declare_counter loop
;set_counter loop 0

console_command toggle_perfect_spy
	
select_ui_element advisor_dismiss_button
simulate_mouse_click lclick_up
suspend_unscripted_advice true
declare_show_me

while I_AdvisorVisible 
end_while

monitor_event GameReloaded TrueCondition 
terminate_script
end_monitor

;monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType egypt
;advance_advice_thread senate_mission_conquering_sicily_thread 
;suspend_unscripted_advice true
;declare_show_me
;end_monitor

    ;1 ;CAP MONEY;

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;player factions;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter romans_player
declare_counter roman_rebels_player
declare_counter carthage_player
declare_counter gauls_player
declare_counter boii_player
declare_counter germans_player
declare_counter dacia_player
declare_counter sparta_player
declare_counter macedon_player
declare_counter greek_cities_player
declare_counter seleucid_player
declare_counter egypt_player
declare_counter bosporus_player
declare_counter thrace_player
declare_counter scythia_player
declare_counter pontus_player
declare_counter armenia_player
declare_counter parthia_player
declare_counter pergamum_player
declare_counter saba_player

set_counter romans_player 0
set_counter roman_rebels_player 0
set_counter carthage_player 0
set_counter gauls_player 0
set_counter boii_player 0
set_counter germans_player 0
set_counter dacia_player 0
set_counter sparta_player 0
set_counter macedon_player 0
set_counter greek_cities_player 0
set_counter seleucid_player 0
set_counter egypt_player 0
set_counter bosporus_player 0
set_counter thrace_player 0
set_counter scythia_player 0
set_counter pontus_player 0
set_counter armenia_player 0
set_counter parthia_player 0
set_counter pergamum_player 0
set_counter saba_player 0

if I_LocalFaction romans_scipii
    set_counter romans_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction roman_rebels
    set_counter roman_rebels_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction carthage
    set_counter carthage_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction gauls
    set_counter gauls_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction spain
    set_counter boii_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction germans
    set_counter germans_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction dacia
    set_counter dacia_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction numidia
    set_counter sparta_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction macedon
    set_counter macedon_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction greek_cities
    set_counter greek_cities_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction seleucid
    set_counter seleucid_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction egypt
    set_counter egypt_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction romans_julii
    set_counter bosporus_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction thrace
    set_counter thrace_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction scythia
    set_counter scythia_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction pontus
    set_counter pontus_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction armenia
    set_counter armenia_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction parthia
    set_counter parthia_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction britons
	set_counter pergamum_player 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction romans_brutii
	set_counter saba_player 1
end_if

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_julii
        and I_TurnNumber > 60
        and Treasury > 600000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
    end_monitor    
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_julii
        and I_TurnNumber > 60
        and Treasury > 400000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_julii
        and I_TurnNumber > 60
        and Treasury > 300000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_julii
        and I_TurnNumber > 60
        and Treasury > 280000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_julii
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber > 60
        and Treasury > 200000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, -20000
    end_monitor

        console_command add_money parthia, -20000

        and not FactionIsLocal
        and not I_LocalFaction romans_scipii
        if I_SettlementOwner Massilia = gauls
        and I_NumberOfSettlements gauls > 15
        console_command add_money gauls, -40000
        console_command add_money gauls, -40000
        end_if
end_monitor

        console_command add_money parthia, 24000
    end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType pontus
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and I_NumberOfSettlements pontus < 4
        and Treasury < 25000
        console_command add_money pontus, 20000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType pontus
        and FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury < -20000
        console_command add_money pontus, 35000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType pontus
        and FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury < -10000
        console_command add_money pontus, 25000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType pontus
        and FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury < -1000
        console_command add_money pontus, 15000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType pontus
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury < -20000
        console_command add_money pontus, 25000
end_monitor

    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType gauls
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury < 30000
        and I_NumberOfSettlements gauls < 4
        console_command add_money gauls, 20000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType gauls
        and FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury < -11000
        console_command add_money gauls, 30000
    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType gauls
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury < -15000
        console_command add_money gauls, 24000
    end_monitor

        and not FactionIsLocal
        and I_NumberOfSettlements germans < 4

    end_monitor

    end_monitor
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType germans
        and not FactionIsLocal
        and Treasury < -15000
        console_command add_money germans, 24000
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Garrison script;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Roman militias;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Rome_undersiege
set_counter Rome_undersiege 0
;monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Roma
    ;and I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 0
    ;if I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
    ;and I_FactionBesieging roman_rebels
    ;set_counter Rome_undersiege 1
    ;end_if
;end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Roma
if I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 95,127
		set_counter Rome_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 95,127
		set_counter Rome_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 95,127
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 95,127
	set_counter Rome_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 95,127
		set_counter Rome_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 95,127
		set_counter Rome_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 95,127
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 95,127
	set_counter Rome_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile roman_rebels general, 2 95,127
		set_counter Rome_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile roman_rebels family, 2 95,127
		set_counter Rome_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile roman_rebels family, 2 95,127

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Roma
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 0
		console_command create_unit Roma "roman triarii" 4 2 1 1
        console_command create_unit Roma "roman princeps" 5 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Roma "roman hastati" 5 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Roma "roman hastati" 1 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Roma "roman velite" 2 2 0 2
        console_command create_unit Roma "roman city militia" 2 3 3 3
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 40000
		set_counter Rome_undersiege 2
end_if

	if I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Rome_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
		console_command create_unit Roma "roman republican legion" 5 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Roma "roman republican legion" 5 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Roma "roman republican legion" 5 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Roma "roman velite" 2 2 0 2
		console_command create_unit Roma "roman archer" 1 2 1 1
        console_command create_unit Roma "roman city militia" 2 3 3 3
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 40000
		set_counter Roma_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;roman mobilize;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter roman_mobilize
set_counter roman_mobilize 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal ;FactionType romans_scipii
and not FactionIsLocal
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
        if I_SettlementOwner Roma != romans_scipii
        set_counter roman_mobilize 1
	end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Arretium != romans_scipii
        set_counter roman_mobilize 1
    end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Ariminum != romans_scipii
        set_counter roman_mobilize 1
    end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Capua != romans_scipii
        set_counter roman_mobilize 1
    end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Croton != romans_scipii
        set_counter roman_mobilize 1
    end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Tarentum != romans_scipii
        set_counter roman_mobilize 1
	end_if
		if I_SettlementOwner Ancona != romans_scipii
        set_counter roman_mobilize 1
	end_if

if I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Ariminum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Capua = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Tarentum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Ancona = romans_scipii
set_counter roman_mobilize 0
end_if
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor
    
monitor_event UnitTrained FactionType romans_scipii
and not FactionIsLocal
and SettlementName Roma
and UnitType roman hastati
and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
and I_CompareCounter roman_mobilize = 1
console_command kill_character "Spurius"
                spawn_army
            faction romans_scipii
            character Spurius, general, age 30, x 95, y 128
            unit roman generals guard cavalry early, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman velite, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman velite, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman velite, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman light cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman heavy equites, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 10000
console_command add_population Roma -3400
end_monitor 

monitor_event UnitTrained FactionType romans_scipii
and not FactionIsLocal
and SettlementName Roma
and UnitType roman princeps
and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
and I_CompareCounter roman_mobilize = 1
console_command kill_character "Spurius"
                spawn_army
            faction romans_scipii
            character Spurius, general, age 30, x 95, y 128
            unit roman generals guard cavalry early, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman velite, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman velite, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman velite, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman light cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman heavy equites, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 10000
console_command add_population Roma -3400
end_monitor 

monitor_event UnitTrained FactionType romans_scipii
and not FactionIsLocal
and SettlementName Roma
and UnitType roman triarii
and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
and I_CompareCounter roman_mobilize = 1
and I_CompareCounter ScipioLegions = 0
console_command kill_character "Spurius"
                spawn_army

            unit roman velite, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman triarii, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman light cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman heavy equites, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 10000
console_command add_population Ancona -3400
end_monitor 

monitor_event UnitTrained FactionType romans_scipii
and not FactionIsLocal
and SettlementName Ancona
and UnitType roman republican legion first
and I_CompareCounter roman_mobilize = 1
console_command kill_character "Spurius"
                spawn_army
            faction romans_scipii
            character Spurius, general, age 30, x 101, y 129
            unit roman generals guard cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman republican legion, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman republican legion, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman republican legion, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman republican legion, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman republican legion, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman republican legion, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit marian evocati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit marian evocati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman republican legion first, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman infantry auxillia, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman infantry auxillia, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman auxillia legion, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman auxillia legion, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman archer auxillia, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman light infantry auxillia, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman light infantry auxillia, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman medium cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman medium cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 10000
console_command add_population Ancona -3400
end_monitor

;declare_counter romanrevolt
;set_counter romanrevolt 0
;monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_scipii
;    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 0
;    if I_CompareCounter romanrevolt = 0
;    and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
;    and I_SettlementOwner Roma != romans_scipii
;    and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 95,127
;	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 95,127
;    set_counter romanrevolt 1
;	end_if
;	if I_CompareCounter romanrevolt = 2
;    and I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
;    set_counter romanrevolt 0
;	end_if
;end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Roma
  and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 0
  and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
  if I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 0
  and I_SettlementOwner Roma != romans_scipii
  and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
  console_command kill_character "Herennius"
            spawn_army
            faction romans_scipii
            character Herennius, general, age 30, x 97, y 128
            unit roman princeps, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman princeps, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman evocati, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman evocati, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman hastati, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit roman velite, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit roman velite, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit roman velite, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit roman triarii, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit roman triarii, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit roman triarii, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit roman triarii, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit roman light cavalry, exp 7 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit roman heavy equites, exp 6 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
end
;set_counter romanrevolt 2
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 25000
console_command create_building Roma "monument_victory_minor"
end_if

  if I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
  and I_SettlementOwner Roma != romans_scipii
  and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
  console_command kill_character "Marcellus"
            spawn_army
	faction romans_scipii
    	character Asinius, general, age 43, x 97, y 128
		unit roman generals guard cavalry, exp 6 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman republican legion, exp 6 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman velite, exp 6 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman velite, exp 6 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman archer, exp 5 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman archer, exp 5 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman infantry auxillia, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman infantry auxillia, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman medium cavalry, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit roman medium cavalry, exp 5 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
end
;set_counter romanrevolt 2
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 25000
console_command create_building Roma "monument_victory_minor"
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;roman province;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Tolosa;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Tolosa_undersiege
set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType gauls
if I_CompareCounter Tolosa_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls general, 2 54,141
		set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls family, 2 54,141
		set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Tolosa_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls family, 2 54,141
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls general, 2 54,141
	set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType carthage
if I_CompareCounter Tolosa_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 54,141
		set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 54,141
		set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Tolosa_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 54,141
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 54,141
	set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Tolosa
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Tolosa_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
		set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 2
		console_command create_unit Tolosa "roman hastati" 5 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Tolosa "roman princeps" 4 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Tolosa "roman velite" 2 2 0 2
		console_command create_unit Tolosa "roman city militia" 2 2 3 1
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
		set_counter Tolosa_undersiege 2
		console_command create_unit Tolosa "roman republican legion" 4 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Tolosa "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 0 2
		console_command create_unit Tolosa "roman city militia" 2 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Tolosa "roman archer" 1 1 1 1
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Massilia_undersiege

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls family, 2 67,138

	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls family, 2 67,138
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls general, 2 67,138
	set_counter Massilia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

if I_CompareCounter Massilia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 67,138

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 67,138
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 67,138
	set_counter Massilia_undersiege 0

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Massilia
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Massilia_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
		console_command create_unit Massilia "roman hastati" 5 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Massilia "roman princeps" 4 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Massilia "roman velite" 2 2 0 2
		console_command create_unit Massilia "roman city militia" 2 2 3 1
		set_counter Massilia_undersiege 2
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
		console_command create_unit Massilia "roman republican legion" 4 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Massilia "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 0 2
		console_command create_unit Massilia "roman city militia" 2 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Massilia "roman archer" 1 1 1 1
		set_counter Massilia_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 91,136
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 91,136

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans family, 2 91,136
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans general, 2 91,136

	and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain general, 2 91,136
        and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
		set_counter Arretium_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain family, 2 91,136
        and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
		set_counter Arretium_undersiege 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain family, 2 91,136
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain general, 2 91,136
	set_counter Arretium_undersiege 0

	and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 91,136
        and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
		set_counter Arretium_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 91,136
        and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
		set_counter Arretium_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Arretium_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 91,136
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 91,136
	set_counter Arretium_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Arretium_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 91,136
        and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
		set_counter Arretium_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 91,136
        and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
		set_counter Arretium_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Arretium_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 91,136
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 91,136
	set_counter Arretium_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Arretium
and not SettlementIsLocal
	if I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_scipii
    and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
	and I_CompareCounter Arretium_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
        console_command create_unit Arretium "roman velite" 2 2 1 2
		console_command create_unit Arretium "roman city militia" 2 2 3 1
		console_command create_unit Arretium "roman hastati" 4 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Arretium "roman princeps" 4 1 2 1
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 35000
        set_counter Arretium_undersiege 2
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Arretium_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
		console_command create_unit Arretium "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 1 2
		console_command create_unit Arretium "roman city militia" 2 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Arretium "roman archer" 1 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Arretium "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 35000        
        set_counter Arretium_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Ariminum_undersiege = 1

	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
        console_command create_unit Ariminum "roman velite" 2 2 1 2
		console_command create_unit Ariminum "roman city militia" 2 2 3 1
		console_command create_unit Ariminum "roman hastati" 4 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Ariminum "roman princeps" 4 1 2 1
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 35000
set_counter Ariminum_undersiege 2
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Ariminum = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
		console_command create_unit Ariminum "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Ariminum "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 1 2
		console_command create_unit Ariminum "roman city militia" 2 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Ariminum "roman archer" 1 1 1 1

set_counter Ariminum_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Croton_undersiege

    and not SettlementIsLocal
if I_CompareCounter Croton_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 114,113
		set_counter Croton_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 114,113
		set_counter Croton_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 114,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 114,113
	set_counter Croton_undersiege 0

	and I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii

        and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 114,113

	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 114,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 114,113

	and I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 114,113

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 114,113

	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 114,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 114,113
	set_counter Croton_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Croton_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 114,113
		set_counter Croton_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 114,113
		set_counter Croton_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Croton_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 114,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 114,113
	set_counter Croton_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Croton_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 114,113
		set_counter Croton_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 114,113
		set_counter Croton_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Croton_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 114,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 114,113
	set_counter Croton_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Croton
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Croton_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
        console_command create_unit Croton "roman velite" 2 2 0 2
		console_command create_unit Croton "roman city militia" 2 2 3 1
		console_command create_unit Croton "roman hastati" 4 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Croton "roman princeps" 4 1 2 1
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 35000
set_counter Croton_undersiege 2
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    set_counter Croton_undersiege 2
		console_command create_unit Croton "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 1 2
		console_command create_unit Croton "roman city militia" 2 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Croton "roman archer" 1 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Croton "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
console_command add_money romans_scipii, 35000
set_counter Croton_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Gergovia
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Gergovia_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Gergovia = gauls
	and I_FactionBesieged gauls
    and I_CompareCounter Gergovia_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Gergovia "barb naked fanatics gauls" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Gergovia "warband sword gaul" 4 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Gergovia "heavy warband" 4 0 2 2
		console_command create_unit Gergovia "barb peltast gaul" 1 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Gergovia "barb infantry gaul" 2 2 2 2
        console_command add_money gauls, 40000
                spawn_army
            faction gauls
            character Vercingetorix, general, age 30, x 55, y 148
            unit barb chieftain cavalry early gaul, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb warguard gaul, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband huntsman gaul, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul chief, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul Violent warriors, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul bogaty, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy cavlry, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb noble cavalry gaul, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
set_counter Gergovia_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements gauls = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType romans_julii
if I_CompareCounter Patavium_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Patavium = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 94,146
		set_counter Patavium_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 94,146
		set_counter Patavium_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Patavium_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 94,146
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 94,146
	set_counter Patavium_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Patavium
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Patavium_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Patavium = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Patavium_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
    	console_command create_unit Patavium "roman princeps" 5 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Patavium "roman hastati" 2 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Patavium "roman hastati" 5 2 2 1
        console_command create_unit Patavium "roman velite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Patavium "roman triarii" 3 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Patavium "roman light cavalry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 35000
        set_counter Patavium_undersiege 2
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Patavium = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Patavium_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    	console_command create_unit Patavium "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Patavium "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Patavium "roman republican legion" 3 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Patavium "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 1 2
		console_command create_unit Patavium "roman archer" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Patavium "roman heavy equites" 2 1 3 1
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 35000
        set_counter Patavium_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Segestica
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Segestica_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Segestica = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Segestica_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
    	console_command create_unit Segestica "roman princeps" 5 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman hastati" 2 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman hastati" 5 2 2 1
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman velite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman triarii" 3 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman light cavalry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
        set_counter Segestica_undersiege 2
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Segestica = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Segestica_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 0
    	console_command create_unit Segestica "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman republican legion" 3 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Segestica "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 1 2
		console_command create_unit Segestica "roman archer" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Segestica "roman heavy equites" 2 1 3 1
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
        set_counter Segestica_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Segestica = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Segestica_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 1
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman legionary cohort i" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman legionary cohort i" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Segestica "roman infantry auxillia" 4 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Segestica "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 0 2
		console_command create_unit Segestica "roman archer auxillia" 1 1 1 1
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
		set_counter Segestica_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 0
    	console_command create_unit Scodra "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Scodra "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Scodra "roman republican legion" 3 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Scodra "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 1 2
		console_command create_unit Scodra "roman archer" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Scodra "roman heavy equites" 2 1 3 1
        set_counter Scodra_undersiege 2
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Scodra = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Scodra_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 1
        console_command create_unit Scodra "roman legionary cohort i" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Scodra "roman legionary cohort i" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Scodra "roman infantry auxillia" 4 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Scodra "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 0 2
		console_command create_unit Scodra "roman archer auxillia" 1 1 1 1
		set_counter Scodra_undersiege 2
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Pella;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Pella_undersiege
set_counter Pella_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType dacia
if I_CompareCounter Pella_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Pella = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 136,124
		set_counter Pella_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 136,124
		set_counter Pella_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Pella_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 136,124
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 136,124
	set_counter Pella_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 136,124
	set_counter Pella_undersiege 0
end_if

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Pella
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Pella_undersiege = 1
if I_SettlementOwner Pella = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Pella_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
    	console_command create_unit Pella "roman princeps" 5 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman hastati" 2 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman hastati" 5 2 2 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman velite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman triarii" 3 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman light cavalry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
        set_counter Pella_undersiege 2
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Pella = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Pella_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 0
    	console_command create_unit Pella "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman republican legion" 3 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Pella "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 1 2
		console_command create_unit Pella "roman archer" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Pella "roman heavy equites" 2 1 3 1
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
        set_counter Pella_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Pella = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Pella_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman legionary cohort i" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman legionary cohort i" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "roman infantry auxillia" 4 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Pella "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 0 2
		console_command create_unit Pella "roman archer auxillia" 1 1 1 1
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
		set_counter Pella_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Pella
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Pella_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Pella = macedon
	and I_FactionBesieged macedon
    and I_CompareCounter Pella_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Pella "Halkaspist" 1 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Pella "greek swordsmen" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Pella "greek pikemen macedonia" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Pella "greek xystophoroi" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Pella "greek royal cavalry" 1 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Pella "thureos spears" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Pella "greek peltast" 1 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Pella "greek levy pikemen" 2 3 2 2
console_command add_money macedon, 40000
if I_NumberOfSettlements macedon < 5
    console_command kill_character "Zeuxis"
            spawn_army
            faction macedon
            character Zeuxis, general, age 30, x 134, y 124
            unit greek royal cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek heavy swordsmen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek heavy swordsmen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek royal pikemen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek royal pikemen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit Halkaspist, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek xystophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek xystophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
end_if
set_counter Pella_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements macedon = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Larissa_undersiege
set_counter Larissa_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType romans_scipii
if I_CompareCounter Larissa_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Larissa = macedon
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 136,115
		set_counter Larissa_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 136,115
		set_counter Larissa_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Larissa_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 136,115
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 136,115
	set_counter Larissa_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Larissa_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Larissa = macedon
	and I_FactionBesieged macedon
    and I_CompareCounter Larissa_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Larissa "greek pikemen macedonia" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Larissa "greek swordsmen" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Larissa "thureos spears" 3 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Larissa "greek levy pikemen" 3 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Larissa "greek peltast" 1 3 2 2
console_command add_money macedon, 40000
if I_NumberOfSettlements macedon < 5
console_command kill_character "Zeuxis"
            spawn_army
            faction macedon
            character Zeuxis, general, age 30, x 134, y 124
            unit greek royal cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek heavy swordsmen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek heavy swordsmen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek royal pikemen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek royal pikemen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit Halkaspist, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek xystophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek xystophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
end_if
set_counter Larissa_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Thessalonica;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Thessalonica_undersiege
set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType romans_scipii
if I_CompareCounter Thessalonica_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Thessalonica = macedon
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 139,122
		set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 139,122
		set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Thessalonica_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 139,122
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 139,122
	set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType thrace
if I_CompareCounter Thessalonica_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Thessalonica = macedon

		set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 139,122

end_monitor

if I_CompareCounter Thessalonica_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Thessalonica = macedon
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 139,122
		set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 139,122
		set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Thessalonica_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 139,122
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 139,122
	set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Thessalonica
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Thessalonica_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Thessalonica = macedon
	and I_FactionBesieged macedon
    and I_CompareCounter Thessalonica_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Thessalonica "greek pikemen macedonia" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Thessalonica "greek swordsmen" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Thessalonica "thureos spears" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Thessalonica "greek heavy cavalry" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Thessalonica "greek peltast" 1 3 2 3
		console_command create_unit Thessalonica "greek levy pikemen" 2 3 2 2
console_command add_money macedon, 40000
if I_SettlementOwner Pella != macedon
console_command kill_character "Zeuxis"
            spawn_army
            faction macedon
            character Zeuxis, general, age 30, x 134, y 124
            unit greek royal cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek heavy swordsmen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek heavy swordsmen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek pikemen macedonia, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek royal pikemen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek royal pikemen, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit Halkaspist, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek xystophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek xystophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
end_if
set_counter Thessalonica_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

	and I_SettlementOwner Apollonia = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 125,119
		set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 125,119
		set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 125,119
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 125,119
	set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile seleucid family, 2 125,119
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile seleucid general, 2 125,119
	set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 0

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain general, 2 125,119

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain family, 2 125,119

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain general, 2 125,119

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType numidia
if I_CompareCounter Apollonia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Apollonia = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 125,119
		set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 125,119
		set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Apollonia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 125,119
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 125,119
	set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType thrace
if I_CompareCounter Apollonia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Apollonia = romans_scipii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 125,119
		set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 125,119
		set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Apollonia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 125,119
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 125,119
	set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Apollonia
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Apollonia_undersiege = 1
if I_SettlementOwner Apollonia = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Apollonia_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions != 1
    	console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman princeps" 5 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman hastati" 2 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman hastati" 5 2 2 1
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman velite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman triarii" 3 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman light cavalry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
        set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 2
end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Apollonia = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Apollonia_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 0
    	console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman republican legion" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman republican legion" 3 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 1 2
		console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman archer" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman heavy equites" 2 1 3 1        
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
        set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Apollonia = romans_scipii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_scipii
    and I_CompareCounter Apollonia_undersiege = 1
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 1
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman legionary cohort i" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman legionary cohort i" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman infantry auxillia" 4 1 3 1
		console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman light infantry auxillia" 2 1 0 2
		console_command create_unit Apollonia "roman archer auxillia" 1 1 1 1        
        console_command add_money romans_scipii, 30000
		set_counter Apollonia_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;and I_CompareCounter Antioch_undersiege = 1

    and I_CompareCounter Antioch_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Antioch "greek heavy swordsmen" 1 0 1 1

		console_command create_unit Antioch "greek peltast" 2 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Antioch "greek levy pikemen" 2 0 2 1
        console_command create_unit Antioch "eastern cavalry" 2 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Antioch "greek xystophoroi" 1 1 1 1
        console_command add_money seleucid, 40000
		set_counter Antioch_undersiege 2
end_if

end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Seleucia_undersiege

if I_CompareCounter Seleucia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Seleucia = seleucid
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 2 241,109
		set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 241,109
		set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 241,109
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 2 241,109
	set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 0

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 241,109

	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 241,109
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 241,109

end_if

if I_CompareCounter Seleucia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Seleucia = seleucid

		set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 241,109

	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Seleucia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 241,109
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 241,109
	set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Seleucia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Seleucia = seleucid
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia general, 2 241,109
		set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia family, 2 241,109
		set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Seleucia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia family, 2 241,109
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia general, 2 241,109
	set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements seleucid = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Seleucia
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Seleucia_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Seleucia = seleucid
	and I_FactionBesieged seleucid
    and I_CompareCounter Seleucia_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Seleucia "greek levy pikemen" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Seleucia "greek heavy swordsmen" 1 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Seleucia "greek swordsmen" 3 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Seleucia "thureos spears" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Seleucia "greek xystophoroi" 1 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Seleucia "eastern cavalry" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Seleucia "greek peltast" 2 3 2 2
        console_command add_money seleucid, 30000
        set_counter Seleucia_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements seleucid = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Babylon;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Babylon_undersiege
set_counter Babylon_undersiege 0
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Babylon
if I_CompareCounter Babylon_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Babylon = seleucid
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 2 237,103
		set_counter Babylon_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 241,109
		set_counter Babylon_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Babylon_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 237,103
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 2 237,103
	set_counter Babylon_undersiege 0
end_if

	and I_SettlementOwner Babylon = seleucid
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii general, 2 237,103

and not SettlementIsLocal

	and I_FactionBesieged seleucid
    and I_CompareCounter Babylon_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Babylon "greek heavy swordsmen" 2 0 2 2
		console_command create_unit Babylon "thureos spears" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Babylon "greek swordsmen" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Babylon "greek levy pikemen" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Babylon "eastern cavalry" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Babylon "greek xystophoroi" 1 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Babylon "greek peltast" 2 1 2 2
        console_command add_money seleucid, 30000
        set_counter Babylon_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements seleucid = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

        console_command create_unit Edessa "greek swordsmen" 3 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Edessa "thureos spears" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Edessa "greek levy pikemen" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Edessa "eastern cavalry" 2 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Edessa "greek xystophoroi" 1 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Edessa "greek peltast" 2 1 2 1
        console_command add_money seleucid, 40000
        set_counter Edessa_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements seleucid = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile parthia family, 2 82,101
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile parthia general, 2 82,101

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Carthago
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Carthago_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Carthago = carthage
	and I_FactionBesieged carthage
    and I_CompareCounter Carthago_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Carthago "carthaginian legionary" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Carthago "carthaginian sacred band infantry" 1 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Carthago "carthaginian heavy infantry" 3 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Carthago "carthaginian heavy swordsman" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Carthago "carthaginian peltast" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Carthago "carthaginian archer" 1 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Carthago "carthaginian cavalry royal" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Carthago "numidian cavalry" 3 3 2 2
        console_command add_money carthage, 40000
    if I_SettlementOwner Hippo_Regius != carthage
            spawn_army
            faction carthage
            character Zeuxis, general, age 30, x 79, y 101
            unit carthaginian general's cavalry, exp 4 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian legionary, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian legionary, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian sacred band infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian sacred band infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit merc balearic slingers, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy swordsman, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy swordsman, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy swordsman, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy swordsman, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian archer, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian royal cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian cavalry royal, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit numidian cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 3
            unit numidian cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 3
end
end_if
        set_counter Carthago_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements carthage = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Hadrumetum;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege
set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 0
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Hadrumetum
if I_CompareCounter Hadrumetum_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Hadrumetum = carthage
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 85,95
		set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 85,95
		set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Hadrumetum_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 85,95
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 85,95
	set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Hadrumetum_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Hadrumetum = carthage
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 85,95
		set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 85,95
		set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Hadrumetum_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 85,95
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 85,95
	set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Hadrumetum_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Hadrumetum = carthage
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 85,95
		set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 85,95
		set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 1
	end_if

and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Hadrumetum_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Hadrumetum = carthage
	and I_FactionBesieged carthage
    and I_CompareCounter Hadrumetum_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Hadrumetum "carthaginian legionary" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Hadrumetum "carthaginian sacred band infantry" 1 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Hadrumetum "carthaginian heavy infantry" 3 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Hadrumetum "carthaginian heavy swordsman" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Hadrumetum "carthaginian peltast" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Hadrumetum "carthaginian archer" 1 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Hadrumetum "carthaginian cavalry royal" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Hadrumetum "numidian cavalry" 3 3 2 2
        console_command add_money carthage, 40000
        if I_SettlementOwner Carthago != carthage
            spawn_army
            faction carthage
            character Zeuxis, general, age 30, x 80, y 95
            unit carthaginian general's cavalry, exp 4 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian legionary, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian legionary, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian sacred band infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian sacred band infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit merc balearic slingers, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy swordsman, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy swordsman, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy swordsman, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian heavy swordsman, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian archer, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian royal cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian cavalry royal, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit numidian cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 3
            unit numidian cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 3
end
end_if
        set_counter Hadrumetum_undersiege 2
end_if

terminate_monitor
end_if

declare_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege
set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 0
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Lepcis_Magna
if I_CompareCounter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Lepcis_Magna = carthage
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 96,75
		set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 96,75
		set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 96,75
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 96,75
	set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Lepcis_Magna = carthage
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 96,75
		set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 96,75
		set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 96,75
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 96,75
	set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 0

if I_CompareCounter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Lepcis_Magna = carthage
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 96,75
		set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 96,75
		set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 1
	end_if

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Lepcis_Magna
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Lepcis_Magna = carthage
	and I_FactionBesieged carthage
    and I_CompareCounter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Lepcis_Magna "carthaginian legionary" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Lepcis_Magna "carthaginian sacred band infantry" 1 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Lepcis_Magna "carthaginian heavy infantry" 3 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Lepcis_Magna "carthaginian heavy swordsman" 4 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Lepcis_Magna "carthaginian peltast" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Lepcis_Magna "carthaginian archer" 1 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Lepcis_Magna "carthaginian cavalry royal" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Lepcis_Magna "numidian cavalry" 3 3 2 2        
        console_command add_money carthage, 40000
        set_counter Lepcis_Magna_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements carthage = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

		console_command create_unit Carthago_Nova "carthaginian peltast" 2 2 1 1
		console_command create_unit Carthago_Nova "carthaginian archer" 1 2 1 1
		console_command create_unit Carthago_Nova "carthaginian heavy swordsman" 4 1 1 1

        console_command create_unit Carthago_Nova "carthaginian legionary" 2 0 1 1
        console_command create_unit Carthago_Nova "carthaginian sacred band infantry" 1 0 1 1

        console_command create_unit Carthago_Nova "numidian cavalry" 3 3 2 2

end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements carthage = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Athens_undersiege

if I_CompareCounter Athens_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Athens = greek_cities
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 143,107
		set_counter Athens_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 143,107
		set_counter Athens_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Athens_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 143,107
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 143,107
	set_counter Athens_undersiege 0

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 143,107

if I_CompareCounter Athens_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Athens = greek_cities
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii general, 2 143,107
		set_counter Athens_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii family, 2 143,107
		set_counter Athens_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Athens_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii family, 2 143,107
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii general, 2 143,107
	set_counter Athens_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements greek_cities = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Athens
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Athens_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Athens = greek_cities
	and I_FactionBesieged greek_cities
    and I_CompareCounter Athens_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Athens "athenian hoplite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Athens "greek pikemen athens" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Athens "greek hoplite" 4 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Athens "greek swordsmen" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Athens "greek peltast" 2 3 2 3       
		console_command create_unit Athens "hellenic slingers" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Athens "tarantine cavalry" 2 3 2 2
console_command add_money greek_cities, 40000
set_counter Athens_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements greek_cities = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Thermon_undersiege
set_counter Corinth_undersiege 0
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Thermon
if I_CompareCounter Thermon_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Thermon = greek_cities
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 132,111
		set_counter Thermon_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 132,111
		set_counter Thermon_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Thermon_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 132,111
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 132,111
	set_counter Thermon_undersiege 0
end_if

    and I_CompareCounter Thermon_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Thermon "thermon hoplite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Thermon "greek pikemen athens" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Thermon "greek hoplite" 4 2 2 2

declare_counter Mytilene_undersiege
set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 0
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Mytilene
if I_CompareCounter Mytilene_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Mytilene = greek_cities
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 154,113
		set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 154,113
		set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Mytilene_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 154,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 154,113
	set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Mytilene_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Mytilene = greek_cities
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 154,113
		set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 154,113
		set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 154,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 154,113

	set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Mytilene_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Mytilene = greek_cities
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 154,113
		set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 154,113
		set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 154,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 154,113
	set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 0

	and I_SettlementOwner Mytilene = greek_cities
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii general, 2 154,113
		set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii family, 2 154,113

	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii family, 2 154,113
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii general, 2 154,113
	set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 0
end_if

terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Mytilene
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Mytilene_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Mytilene = greek_cities
	and I_FactionBesieged greek_cities
    and I_CompareCounter Mytilene_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Mytilene "Ephesus hoplite" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Mytilene "greek pikemen athens" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Mytilene "greek hoplite" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Mytilene "greek swordsmen" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Mytilene "greek peltast" 2 3 2 3
        console_command create_unit Mytilene "greek cleruhe" 4 3 3 3        
		console_command create_unit Mytilene "hellenic slingers" 2 3 2 2
console_command add_money greek_cities, 40000
set_counter Mytilene_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements greek_cities = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor
