	and I_SettlementOwner Assos = britons
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 152,118
		set_counter Assos_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 152,118
		set_counter Assos_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Assos_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 152,118
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 152,118
	set_counter Assos_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements britons = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Assos
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Assos_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Assos = britons
	and I_FactionBesieged britons
    and I_CompareCounter Assos_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Assos "pergamum hoplite" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Assos "greek pikemen athens" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Assos "greek hoplite" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Assos "greek swordsmen" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Assos "hellenic slingers" 2 3 2 2 
        console_command create_unit Assos "greek peltast" 2 4 2 3
console_command add_money britons, 40000
set_counter Assos_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements britons = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Sardis_undersiege = 1

	and I_FactionBesieged britons
    and I_CompareCounter Sardis_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Sardis "pergamum hoplite" 1 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sardis "greek pikemen athens" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Sardis "greek hoplite" 4 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Sardis "greek swordsmen" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sardis "hellenic slingers" 2 2 2 2 
        console_command create_unit Sardis "greek peltast" 2 2 2 3
        console_command create_unit Sardis "eastern cavalry" 2 3 2 2
console_command add_money britons, 40000
set_counter Sardis_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements britons = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Sparta
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Sparta_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Sparta = numidia
	and I_FactionBesieged numidia
    and I_CompareCounter Sparta_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Sparta "spartan thorakitai" 2 4 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sparta "greek hoplite spartan" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sparta "greek royal spartans" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sparta "greek armoured heavy cavalry" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Sparta "greek hoplite" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Sparta "greek juniors" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Sparta "greek peltast" 1 3 2 3

console_command add_money numidia, 40000
set_counter Sparta_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements numidia = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType macedon
if I_CompareCounter Seutopolis_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Seutopolis = thrace
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 148,133
		set_counter Seutopolis_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 148,133
		set_counter Seutopolis_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Seutopolis_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 148,133
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 148,133
	set_counter Seutopolis_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

if I_CompareCounter Seutopolis_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Seutopolis = thrace

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 148,133

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 148,133
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 148,133
	set_counter Seutopolis_undersiege 0

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 148,133
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 148,133
	set_counter Seutopolis_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Seutopolis
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Seutopolis_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Seutopolis = thrace
	and I_FactionBesieged thrace
    and I_CompareCounter Seutopolis_undersiege = 1
    	console_command create_unit Seutopolis "defence kings" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Seutopolis "thracian hoplite" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Seutopolis "thureos spears" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Seutopolis "thracian thureos swordsmen" 4 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Seutopolis "gettic light peltast" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Seutopolis "warband falx dacian" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Seutopolis "thracian nobles" 2 0 2 2
        console_command add_money thrace, 40000
        if I_SettlementOwner Byzantium != thrace
spawn_army
	faction thrace
    	character Spartacus, general, age 29, x 153, y 134
		unit greek poens cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit gettic light peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit gettic peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit thracian hoplite, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian hoplite, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thorakitai, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thorakitai, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit thracian heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian light cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian light cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit greek poens cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        end
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Tomi != thrace
spawn_army
	faction thrace
    	character Spartacus, general, age 29, x 153, y 133
		unit greek poens cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit gettic light peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit gettic peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit thracian hoplite, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian hoplite, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thorakitai, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thorakitai, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit thracian heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian light cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian light cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit greek poens cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        end
        end_if
set_counter Seutopolis_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Byzantium;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Byzantium_undersiege
set_counter Byzantium_undersiege 0

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType dacia
if I_CompareCounter Byzantium_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Byzantium = thrace
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 160,129
		set_counter Byzantium_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 160,129
		set_counter Byzantium_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Byzantium_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 160,129
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 160,129
	set_counter Byzantium_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType macedon
if I_CompareCounter Byzantium_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Byzantium = thrace
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 160,129
		set_counter Byzantium_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 160,129
		set_counter Byzantium_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Byzantium_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 160,129
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 160,129
	set_counter Byzantium_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Byzantium
and not SettlementIsLocal
;and I_CompareCounter Byzantium_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Byzantium = thrace
	and I_FactionBesieged thrace
    and I_CompareCounter Byzantium_undersiege = 1
       	console_command create_unit Byzantium "thracian thureos swordsmen" 4 2 1 1
        console_command create_unit Byzantium "thracian thorakitai" 4 2 1 1
        console_command create_unit Byzantium "thracian hoplite" 2 2 1 1
		console_command create_unit Byzantium "gettic light peltast" 2 2 2 1
		console_command create_unit Byzantium "thureos spears" 4 3 1 1
        console_command create_unit Byzantium "thracian infantry" 2 3 1 1
        console_command create_unit Byzantium "thracian nobles" 2 2 1 1

console_command add_money thrace, 40000
if I_SettlementOwner Seutopolis != thrace
spawn_army
	faction thrace
    	character Spartacus, general, age 29, x 153, y 134
		unit greek poens cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit gettic light peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit gettic peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit thracian hoplite, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian hoplite, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thorakitai, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thorakitai, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit thracian heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian light cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian light cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit greek poens cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Tomi != thrace
spawn_army
	faction thrace
    	character Spartacus, general, age 29, x 153, y 133
		unit greek poens cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit gettic light peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit gettic peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thureos spears, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thureos swordsmen, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit thracian hoplite, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian hoplite, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thorakitai, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian thorakitai, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
        unit thracian heavy cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian light cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit thracian light cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit greek poens cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
end_if
set_counter Byzantium_undersiege 2
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Tomi_undersiege;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Tomi_undersiege
set_counter Tomi_undersiege 0

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType dacia
if I_CompareCounter Tomi_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Tomi = thrace
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 157,144
		set_counter Tomi_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 157,144
		set_counter Tomi_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Tomi_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia family, 2 157,144
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile dacia general, 2 157,144
	set_counter Tomi_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType macedon
if I_CompareCounter Tomi_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Tomi = thrace
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 157,144
		set_counter Tomi_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 157,144
		set_counter Tomi_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Tomi_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 157,144
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 157,144
	set_counter Tomi_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 157,144
		set_counter Tomi_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Tomi_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 157,144
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 157,144
	set_counter Tomi_undersiege 0
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements thrace = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Buridava_undersiege;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Buridava_undersiege
set_counter Buridava_undersiege 0

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType thrace
if I_CompareCounter Buridava_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Buridava = dacia
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 144,145
		set_counter Buridava_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 144,145
		set_counter Buridava_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Buridava_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 144,145
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 144,145
	set_counter Buridava_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType macedon
if I_CompareCounter Buridava_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Buridava = dacia

    and I_CompareCounter Buridava_undersiege = 1
    	console_command create_unit Buridava "barb warguard dacian" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Buridava "dacian sword warband" 4 2 2 2

        console_command create_unit Buridava "barb infantry dacian" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Buridava "barb noble cavalry dacian" 3 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Buridava "dacian chieftain noble" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Buridava "gettic light peltast" 1 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Buridava "gettic peltast" 1 2 2 2

		unit dacian sword warband, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

		unit warband falx dacian, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

		unit barb warguard dacian, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

	and I_SettlementOwner Sarmizegetusa = dacia
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 137,151
		set_counter Sarmizegetusa_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 137,151
		set_counter Sarmizegetusa_undersiege 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 137,151
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 137,151
	set_counter Sarmizegetusa_undersiege 0
end_if

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Sarmizegetusa
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Sarmizegetusa_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Sarmizegetusa = dacia
	and I_FactionBesieged dacia
    and I_CompareCounter Sarmizegetusa_undersiege = 1
    	console_command create_unit Sarmizegetusa "barb warguard dacian" 2 2 1 1
		console_command create_unit Sarmizegetusa "dacian sword warband" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sarmizegetusa "warband falx dacian" 3 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sarmizegetusa "barb infantry dacian" 2 3 1 1
        console_command create_unit Sarmizegetusa "barb noble cavalry dacian" 3 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Sarmizegetusa "dacian chieftain noble" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Sarmizegetusa "gettic light peltast" 1 2 2 1
		console_command create_unit Sarmizegetusa "gettic peltast" 1 2 2 2

		unit dacian sword warband, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

		unit dacian sword warband, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

		unit warband falx dacian, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

	faction dacia
    	character Banat, general, age 29, x 139, y 151
		unit dacian chieftain noble, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Sarmizegetusa_undersiege;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Docidava_undersiege
set_counter Docidava_undersiege 0

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Docidava
and not SettlementIsLocal
if I_CompareCounter Docidava_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Docidava = dacia
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 130,160
		set_counter Docidava_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 130,160
		set_counter Docidava_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Docidava_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 130,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 130,160
	set_counter Docidava_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Docidava_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Docidava = dacia
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 130,160
		set_counter Docidava_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 130,160
		set_counter Docidava_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Docidava_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 130,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 130,160
	set_counter Docidava_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Docidava_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Docidava = dacia
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 130,160
		set_counter Docidava_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 130,160
		set_counter Docidava_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Docidava_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 130,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 130,160

end_if

	and I_SettlementOwner Docidava = dacia

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain family, 2 130,160
		set_counter Docidava_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain family, 2 130,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain general, 2 130,160
	set_counter Docidava_undersiege 0

	and I_SettlementOwner Docidava = dacia

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls family, 2 130,160

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls family, 2 130,160

	set_counter Docidava_undersiege 0

end_monitor

    and I_CompareCounter Docidava_undersiege = 1

declare_counter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege
set_counter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType macedon
if I_CompareCounter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Neapolis_Scythica = romans_julii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 175,157
		set_counter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 175,157
		set_counter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 175,157
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 175,157
	set_counter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType pontus
if I_CompareCounter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Neapolis_Scythica = romans_julii

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 175,157

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Neapolis_Scythica
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Neapolis_Scythica = romans_julii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_julii
    and I_CompareCounter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "cimmerian hoplite elite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "heavy thureos swordsmen" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "greek swordsmen" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "greek hoplite" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "thureos spears" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "cimmerian royal hippeis" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "cimmerian royal cavalry" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "greek peltast" 2 3 2 2      

console_command add_money romans_julii, 40000
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii < 6
    spawn_army
faction romans_julii
			character Androcles, general, age 30, x 175, y 155
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek peltast, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian hoplite elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian hoplite elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian archer elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian archer elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian royal hippeis, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian royal cavalry, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit bosporan cataphract, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
end
console_command add_money romans_julii, 40000
end_if
		set_counter Neapolis_Scythica_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

	and I_SettlementOwner Olbia = romans_julii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 165,160
		set_counter Olbia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 165,160
		set_counter Olbia_undersiege 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 165,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 165,160
	set_counter Olbia_undersiege 0

if I_CompareCounter Olbia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Olbia = romans_julii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 165,160
		set_counter Olbia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 165,160
		set_counter Olbia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Olbia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 165,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 165,160
	set_counter Olbia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile roman_rebels family, 2 165,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile roman_rebels general, 2 165,160
	set_counter Olbia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Olbia
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Olbia_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Olbia = romans_julii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_julii
    and I_CompareCounter Olbia_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Olbia "cimmerian hoplite elite" 2 2 2 2        
		console_command create_unit Olbia "greek swordsmen" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Olbia "cimmerian royal cavalry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Olbia "greek hoplite" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Olbia "thureos spears" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Olbia "greek peltast" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Olbia "greek medium cavalry" 2 2 2 2

console_command add_money romans_julii, 40000
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii < 5
    spawn_army
faction romans_julii
			character Androcles, general, age 30, x 175, y 155
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek peltast, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian hoplite elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian hoplite elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian archer elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian archer elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian royal hippeis, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian royal cavalry, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit bosporan cataphract, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
end
end_if
    set_counter Olbia_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Tanais_undersiege

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType macedon
if I_CompareCounter Tanais_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Tanais = romans_julii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 191,168
		set_counter Tanais_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 191,168
		set_counter Tanais_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Tanais_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 191,168
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 191,168
	set_counter Tanais_undersiege 0
end_if

    and I_CompareCounter Tanais_undersiege = 1

		console_command create_unit Tanais "greek swordsmen" 2 3 2 2

        console_command create_unit Tanais "greek hoplite" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Tanais "thureos spears" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Tanais "greek peltast" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Tanais "greek medium cavalry" 2 2 2 2

if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii < 6
    spawn_army
faction romans_julii
			character Androcles, general, age 30, x 175, y 155
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek peltast, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian hoplite elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian hoplite elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian archer elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian archer elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Panticapaeum;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Panticapaeum_undersiege
set_counter Panticapaeum_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType macedon
if I_CompareCounter Panticapaeum_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Panticapaeum = romans_julii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 184,157
		set_counter Panticapaeum_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 184,157
		set_counter Panticapaeum_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Panticapaeum_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 184,157
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 184,157
	set_counter Panticapaeum_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

if I_CompareCounter Panticapaeum_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Panticapaeum = romans_julii

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Panticapaeum
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Panticapaeum_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Panticapaeum = romans_julii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_julii
    and I_CompareCounter Panticapaeum_undersiege = 1        
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "cimmerian hoplite elite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "heavy thureos swordsmen" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "greek swordsmen" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "greek hoplite" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "thureos spears" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "cimmerian royal hippeis" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "cimmerian royal cavalry" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Panticapaeum "greek peltast" 2 3 2 2
        
        console_command add_money romans_julii, 40000
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii < 6
    spawn_army
faction romans_julii
			character Androcles, general, age 30, x 175, y 155
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2

            unit greek peltast, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Chersonesos_undersiege;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Chersonesos_undersiege
set_counter Chersonesos_undersiege 0
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Chersonesos
and not SettlementIsLocal
if  I_CompareCounter Chersonesos_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Chersonesos = romans_julii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 175,151
        set_counter Chersonesos_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 175,151
        set_counter Chersonesos_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Chersonesos_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 175,151
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 175,151
    set_counter Chersonesos_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Chersonesos_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Chersonesos = romans_julii

and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Chersonesos_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Chersonesos = romans_julii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_julii
    and I_CompareCounter Chersonesos_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Chersonesos "cimmerian hoplite elite" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Chersonesos "heavy thureos swordsmen" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Chersonesos "greek swordsmen" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Chersonesos "greek hoplite" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Chersonesos "thureos spears" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Chersonesos "cimmerian royal hippeis" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Chersonesos "cimmerian royal cavalry" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Chersonesos "greek peltast" 2 3 2 2
        
        console_command add_money romans_julii, 40000
        console_command add_money romans_julii, 40000
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii < 5
    spawn_army
faction romans_julii
			character Androcles, general, age 30, x 175, y 155
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit greek peltast, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian hoplite elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian hoplite elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian archer elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
			unit cimmerian archer elite, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2

	and I_SettlementOwner Campus_Siracae = scythia
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 215,178
		set_counter Campus_Siracae_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 215,178
		set_counter Campus_Siracae_undersiege 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 215,178

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Campus_Siracae
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Campus_Siracae_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Siracae = scythia
	and I_FactionBesieged scythia
    and I_CompareCounter Campus_Siracae_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "barb head hunting maidens scythian" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "barb scythian nobles" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "warband axe scythian" 4 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "barb noble horse archers scythian" 1 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "warband swords scythian chosen" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "barb horse archers scythian" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "scythian skirmisher" 1 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "barb archer scythian" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Campus_Siracae "barb infantry scythia" 2 2 2 2
        
        console_command add_money scythia, 40000
        if I_NumberOfSettlements scythia < 5
        console_command kill_character "Scylurus"
            spawn_army
	faction scythia
			character Scylurus, general, age 30, x 212, y 178
			unit barb scythian general scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit scythian skirmisher, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb archer scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb archer scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb infantry scythia, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb infantry scythia, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb infantry scythia, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit warband swords scythian chosen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit warband swords scythian chosen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb horse archers scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb horse archers scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb noble horse archers scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb cavalry scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb cavalry scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb scythian nobles, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb scythian nobles, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb scythian nobles2, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit sarmatian elite nobles, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            end        
end_if
        set_counter Campus_Siracae_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

	set_counter Campus_Aorsi_undersiege 0
end_if

	and I_SettlementOwner Campus_Aorsi = scythia

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile armenia family, 2 242,200

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Campus_Aorsi
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Campus_Aorsi_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Aorsi = scythia
	and I_FactionBesieged scythia
    and I_CompareCounter Campus_Aorsi_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "barb head hunting maidens scythian" 2 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "barb scythian nobles" 2 0 1 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "warband axe scythian" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "barb noble horse archers scythian" 1 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "warband swords scythian chosen" 2 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "barb horse archers scythian" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "scythian skirmisher" 1 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "barb archer scythian" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Campus_Aorsi "barb infantry scythia" 2 2 1 1
        console_command add_money scythia, 40000
        if I_NumberOfSettlements scythia < 5
        console_command kill_character "Scylurus"
            spawn_army
	faction scythia
			character Scylurus, general, age 30, x 240, y 199
			unit barb scythian general scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit scythian skirmisher, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb archer scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb archer scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb infantry scythia, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb infantry scythia, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb infantry scythia, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit warband swords scythian chosen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit warband swords scythian chosen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb horse archers scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb horse archers scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb noble horse archers scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb cavalry scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb cavalry scythian, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb scythian nobles, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb scythian nobles, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit barb scythian nobles2, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit sarmatian elite nobles, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            end        
end_if
set_counter Campus_Aorsi_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

    and I_CompareCounter Campus_Massagetae_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "barb head hunting maidens scythian" 2 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "barb scythian nobles" 2 0 1 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "warband axe scythian" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "barb noble horse archers scythian" 1 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "warband swords scythian chosen" 2 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "barb horse archers scythian" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "scythian skirmisher" 1 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "barb archer scythian" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Campus_Massagetae "barb infantry scythia" 2 2 1 1
        
        console_command add_money scythia, 40000
        if I_NumberOfSettlements scythia < 4
        console_command kill_character "Scylurus"
            spawn_army

			character Scylurus, general, age 30, x 275, y 160

			unit scythian skirmisher, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit barb archer scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit barb archer scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit warband axe scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit warband swords scythian chosen, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit warband swords scythian chosen, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit barb horse archers scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit barb horse archers scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit barb noble horse archers scythian, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Alexandria;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Alexandria_undersiege
set_counter Alexandria_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_scipii
if I_CompareCounter Alexandria_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Alexandria = egypt
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 178,76
		set_counter Alexandria_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 178,76
		set_counter Alexandria_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Alexandria_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 178,76
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 178,76
	set_counter Alexandria_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

if I_CompareCounter Alexandria_undersiege = 0

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 178,76

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 178,76
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 178,76
	set_counter Alexandria_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

end_monitor

if I_CompareCounter Alexandria_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Alexandria = egypt
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile armenia general, 2 178,76
		set_counter Alexandria_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile armenia family, 2 178,76

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile armenia family, 2 178,76
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile armenia general, 2 178,76

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Alexandria
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Alexandria_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Alexandria = egypt
	and I_FactionBesieged egypt
    and I_CompareCounter Alexandria_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Alexandria "thureos swordsmen" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Alexandria "thureos spears" 3 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Alexandria "greek pikemen" 4 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Alexandria "egyptian cleruch" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Alexandria "egyptian infantry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Alexandria "egyptian nile infantry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Alexandria "egyptian peltast" 2 3 3 3

console_command add_money egypt, 40000
if I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem != egypt
and I_SettlementOwner Petra != egypt
spawn_army 
    faction egypt
    		character Teos, general, age 30, x 178, y 71
			unit greek general's guard cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit egyptian peltast, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit egyptian nile infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit egyptian nile infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek royal pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit egyptian cleruch, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit egyptian cleruch, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek xystophoroi, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek xystophoroi, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek royal cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            end        
end_if
		set_counter Alexandria_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

        console_command create_unit Memphis "egyptian cleruch" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Memphis "egyptian infantry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Memphis "egyptian peltast" 2 3 2 3

if I_SettlementOwner Jerusalem != egypt
and I_SettlementOwner Thebes != egypt

			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Thebes
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Thebes_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Thebes = egypt
	and I_FactionBesieged egypt
    and I_CompareCounter Thebes_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Thebes "thureos swordsmen" 4 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Thebes "thureos spears" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Thebes "greek pikemen" 3 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Thebes "egyptian nile infantry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Thebes "egyptian cleruch" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Thebes "egyptian infantry" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Thebes "greek xystophoroi" 1 0 2 2
		console_command create_unit Thebes "greek royal cavalry" 1 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Thebes "egyptian peltast" 2 3 2 3

console_command add_money egypt, 40000
set_counter Thebes_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 191,133
		set_counter Amasia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 191,133
		set_counter Amasia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Amasia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities family, 2 191,133
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile greek_cities general, 2 191,133
	set_counter Amasia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType numidia
if I_CompareCounter Amasia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Amasia = pontus
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 191,133
		set_counter Amasia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 191,133

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 191,133

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType egypt

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 191,133

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType britons
if I_CompareCounter Amasia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Amasia = pontus
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 191,133
		set_counter Amasia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 191,133
		set_counter Amasia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Amasia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 191,133
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 191,133
	set_counter Amasia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Amasia
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Amasia_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Amasia = pontus
	and I_FactionBesieged pontus
    and I_CompareCounter Amasia_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Amasia "heavy thureos swordsmen" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Amasia "thureos swordsmen" 4 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Amasia "thureos spears" 4 2 2 2 
        console_command create_unit Amasia "eastern heavy archer" 1 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Amasia "east heavy cavalry" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Amasia "east cappodocian cavalry" 1 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Amasia "greek pikemen" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Amasia "east infantry" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Amasia "east peltast" 1 1 2 2
        console_command add_money pontus, 40000
if I_NumberOfSettlements pontus < 7
    	spawn_army 
        faction pontus
			character Thyrsos, general, age 30, x 189, y 133
			unit east pontic general, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit east hoplite brazen shield, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit eastern heavy archer, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit eastern heavy archer, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit east onager, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit east cappodocian cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit east cappodocian cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
end
end_if 
        set_counter Amasia_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 192,124
		set_counter Mazaka_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 192,124
		set_counter Mazaka_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Mazaka_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 192,124
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon general, 2 192,124
	set_counter Mazaka_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

if I_CompareCounter Mazaka_undersiege = 0

if I_CompareCounter Mazaka_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Mazaka = pontus
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 192,124
		set_counter Mazaka_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 192,124
		set_counter Mazaka_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Mazaka_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 192,124
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 192,124
	set_counter Mazaka_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Mazaka
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Mazaka_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Mazaka = pontus
	and I_FactionBesieged pontus
    and I_CompareCounter Mazaka_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Mazaka "thureos spears" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Mazaka "thureos swordsmen" 5 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Mazaka "east heavy cavalry" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Mazaka "greek pikemen" 3 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Mazaka "east infantry" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Mazaka "east peltast" 1 2 2 2
console_command add_money pontus, 40000
		set_counter Mazaka_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Sinope
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Sinope_undersiege = 1
if I_SettlementOwner Sinope = pontus
	and I_FactionBesieged pontus
    and I_CompareCounter Sinope_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Sinope "thureos swordsmen" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sinope "thureos spears" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Sinope "east heavy cavalry" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Sinope "east peltast" 1 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Sinope "greek pikemen" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Sinope "east infantry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command add_money pontus, 40000
    if I_NumberOfSettlements pontus < 7
        spawn_army 
        faction pontus
			character Thyrsos, general, age 30, x 189, y 133
			unit east pontic general, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit greek pikemen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit east hoplite brazen shield, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit heavy thureos swordsmen, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit eastern heavy archer, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit eastern heavy archer, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit east onager, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit east cappodocian cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit east cappodocian cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
end
end_if
		set_counter Sinope_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Nicomedia;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Nicomedia_undersiege
set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType romans_julii
if I_CompareCounter Nicomedia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = pontus
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 165,128
		set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 165,128
		set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Nicomedia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 165,128
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 165,128
	set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType parthia
if I_CompareCounter Nicomedia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = pontus
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile parthia general, 2 165,128
		set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile parthia family, 2 165,128
		set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile parthia family, 2 165,128
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile parthia general, 2 165,128
	set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 0
end_if

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile seleucid family, 2 165,128

		set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 165,128
		set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 165,128
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 165,128
	set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 165,128

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Nicomedia
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Nicomedia_undersiege = 1
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = pontus
	and I_FactionBesieged pontus
    and I_CompareCounter Nicomedia_undersiege = 1
		console_command create_unit Nicomedia "thureos swordsmen" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Nicomedia "thureos spears" 4 0 2 2
		console_command create_unit Nicomedia "greek pikemen" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Nicomedia "east heavy cavalry" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Nicomedia "east infantry" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Nicomedia "east peltast" 1 1 2 2
		set_counter Nicomedia_undersiege 2
        console_command add_money pontus, 40000
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Ecbatana
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Ecbatana_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Ecbatana = parthia
	and I_FactionBesieged parthia
    and I_CompareCounter Ecbatana_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Ecbatana "eastern heavy infantry parthia" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Ecbatana "parthian thureophoroi" 3 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Ecbatana "eastern auxilia" 3 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Ecbatana "east persian cavalry" 3 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Ecbatana "eastern cavalry" 4 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Ecbatana "east peltast" 1 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Ecbatana "parthian takabara" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Ecbatana "east infantry" 2 2 2 2
        set_counter Ecbatana_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 265,98
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 265,98
	set_counter Charax_undersiege 0
end_if

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Charax
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Charax_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Charax = parthia
	and I_FactionBesieged parthia
    and I_CompareCounter Charax_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Charax "eastern heavy infantry parthia" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Charax "parthian thureophoroi" 3 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Charax "eastern auxilia" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Charax "east persian cavalry" 2 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Charax "eastern cavalry" 4 0 2 2
        console_command create_unit Charax "parthian takabara" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Charax "east infantry" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Charax "east peltast" 1 2 2 2
        set_counter Charax_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

		set_counter Asaak_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Asaak_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia family, 2 292,149
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia general, 2 292,149
	set_counter Asaak_undersiege 0
end_if

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Asaak
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Asaak_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Asaak = parthia
	and I_FactionBesieged parthia
    and I_CompareCounter Asaak_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Asaak "eastern heavy infantry parthia" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Asaak "parthian thureophoroi" 3 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Asaak "eastern auxilia" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Asaak "east persian cavalry" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Asaak "eastern cavalry" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Asaak "parthian takabara" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Asaak "east peltast" 1 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Asaak "east heavy sparabara" 2 4 2 2
		set_counter Asaak_undersiege 2
        end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements parthia < 9
and I_FactionBesieged parthia        
            console_command kill_character "Zoroaster"
            spawn_army
            faction parthia
            character Zoroaster, general, age 30, x 290, y 149
            unit east heavy cataphract, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east persian cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east persian cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east horse archer, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east horse archer, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east horse archer, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east horse archer, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east peltast, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east archer, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit parthian takabara, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit parthian takabara, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east hillmen, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east hillmen, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east hillmen, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit eastern cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit eastern cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
        console_command add_money parthia, 20000
end_if
end_monitor

		console_command create_unit Nisa "east peltast" 1 3 2 3
        if I_NumberOfSettlements parthia < 9

            faction parthia
            character Zoroaster, general, age 30, x 289, y 157

            unit east horse archer, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east peltast, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east archer, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

            unit parthian takabara, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east hillmen, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

            unit east hillmen, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit eastern cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit eastern cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
            spawn_army
            faction parthia
            character Zoroaster, general, age 30, x 289, y 158
            unit east heavy cataphract, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east persian cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east persian cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Bactra;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Bactra_undersiege
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Bactra
and not SettlementIsLocal
if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Bactra = roman_rebels
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 327,148
		set_counter Bactra_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 327,148
		set_counter Bactra_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 327,148
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 327,148
	set_counter Bactra_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Bactra = roman_rebels
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 327,148
		set_counter Bactra_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 327,148
		set_counter Bactra_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii family, 2 327,148
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 327,148
	set_counter Bactra_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Bactra = roman_rebels
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 327,148
		set_counter Bactra_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 327,148
		set_counter Bactra_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 327,148
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 327,148
	set_counter Bactra_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Bactra = roman_rebels
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 327,148
		set_counter Bactra_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 327,148
		set_counter Bactra_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 327,148
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 327,148
	set_counter Bactra_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Bactra = roman_rebels

	set_counter Bactra_undersiege 0

end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Bactra
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Bactra = roman_rebels
	and I_FactionBesieged roman_rebels
    and I_CompareCounter Bactra_undersiege = 1
    	console_command create_unit Bactra "BAKTRIAN NOBLES" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Bactra "thureos swordsmen" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Bactra "heavy thureos swordsmen" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Bactra "greek pikemen" 3 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Bactra "thureos spears" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Bactra "parthian takabara" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Bactra "east horse archer" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Bactra "east peltast" 2 3 2 2
        console_command add_money roman_rebels, 40000
        set_counter Bactra_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

	end_if

end_if

if I_CompareCounter Prophthasia_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Prophthasia = roman_rebels
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii general, 2 329,126
		set_counter Prophthasia_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii family, 2 329,126
		set_counter Prophthasia_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Prophthasia_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii family, 2 329,126
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_brutii general, 2 329,126
	set_counter Prophthasia_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Prophthasia
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Prophthasia_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Prophthasia = roman_rebels
	and I_FactionBesieged roman_rebels
        console_command create_unit Prophthasia "heavy thureos swordsmen" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Prophthasia "thureos swordsmen" 4 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Prophthasia "BAKTRIAN NOBLES" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Prophthasia "east peltast" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Prophthasia "greek pikemen" 3 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Prophthasia "thureos spears" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Prophthasia "parthian takabara" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Prophthasia "east horse archer" 2 1 2 2
        
        console_command add_money roman_rebels, 40000        
    	set_counter Prophthasia_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Armavira
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Armavira_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Armavira = armenia
	and I_FactionBesieged armenia
    and I_CompareCounter Armavira_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Armavira "eastern heavy infantry" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Armavira "east heavy infantry" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Armavira "armenian auxilia" 4 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Armavira "parthian takabara" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Armavira "east peltast" 1 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Armavira "eastern heavy archer" 1 3 2 3
		console_command create_unit Armavira "east infantry" 2 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Armavira "heavy lancer" 1 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Armavira "east heavy cataphract" 1 3 2 2
        
        console_command add_money armenia, 40000
if I_NumberOfSettlements armenia < 3
spawn_army 
    faction armenia
    character Ziaelas, general, age 29, x 230, y 143
		unit east generals cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east heavy sparabara, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east peltast, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit armenian auxilia, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit armenian auxilia, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit armenian auxilia, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit eastern heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit eastern heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east horse archer, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east horse archer, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit heavy lancer, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        unit heavy lancer, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit eastern cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit eastern cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
		unit east heavy cataphract, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
end
end_if
set_counter Armavira_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

and not SettlementIsLocal

	and I_SettlementOwner Gazaca = armenia
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 239,134
        ;and I_FactionBesieged armenia
		set_counter Gazaca_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 239,134
        ;and I_FactionBesieged armenia

	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus family, 2 239,134
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile pontus general, 2 239,134
	set_counter Gazaca_undersiege 0
end_if

	end_if

if I_CompareCounter Gazaca_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile roman_rebels family, 2 239,134
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile roman_rebels general, 2 239,134
	set_counter Gazaca_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Gazaca
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Gazaca_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Gazaca = armenia
	and I_FactionBesieged armenia
    and I_CompareCounter Gazaca_undersiege = 1	
        console_command create_unit Gazaca "armenian auxilia" 5 3 1 1
        console_command create_unit Gazaca "parthian takabara" 4 3 1 1
        console_command create_unit Gazaca "east infantry" 4 3 1 1
        console_command create_unit Gazaca "eastern heavy archer" 1 3 1 1
		console_command create_unit Gazaca "east peltast" 2 3 1 1
        console_command create_unit Gazaca "east horse archer" 4 3 1 1
        
        console_command add_money armenia, 40000
        
if I_NumberOfSettlements armenia < 3

    faction armenia
    character Ziaelas, general, age 29, x 239, y 132

		console_command create_unit Teutoburgum "warband spear german" 2 3 2 2

		console_command create_unit Teutoburgum "heavy warband" 4 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Teutoburgum "barb night raiders german" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Teutoburgum "barb noble cavalry german" 2 0 2 2
        
        console_command add_money germans, 40000
    set_counter Teutoburgum_undersiege 2

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Tulisurgium
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Tulisurgium_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Tulisurgium = germans
	and I_FactionBesieged germans
    and I_CompareCounter Tulisurgium_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Tulisurgium "barb night raiders german" 2 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Tulisurgium "warband axe german" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Tulisurgium "heavy warband" 2 1 2 1
        console_command create_unit Tulisurgium "warband spear german" 3 1 2 1
		console_command create_unit Tulisurgium "barb peltast german" 2 1 1 2
		console_command add_money germans, 40000
        set_counter Tulisurgium_undersiege 2
if I_NumberOfSettlements germans < 6
console_command kill_character "Adalmun"
    spawn_army
	faction germans
    		character Adalmun, general, age 32, x 79, y 183
		unit barb chieftain cavalry german, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit barb peltast german, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit barb peltast german, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit warband spear german, exp 0 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit warband spear german, exp 0 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit warband spear german, exp 0 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit warband spear german, exp 0 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
		unit barb night raiders german, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit german warriors, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit german warriors, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit heavy warband, exp 1 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit warband axe german, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit warband axe german, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit warband axe german, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit german heavy infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit german heavy infantry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit german bodyguard, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit german bodyguard, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit barb noble cavalry german, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
		unit barb cavalry gaul, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
end_if

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Eburonum
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Eburonum_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Eburonum = spain
    and I_FactionBesieged spain
    and I_CompareCounter Eburonum_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Eburonum "chief troop" 1 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Eburonum "barb warguard gaul" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Eburonum "barb naked fanatics gauls" 1 3 2 2
        console_command create_unit Eburonum "gaul chief" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Eburonum "warband sword gaul" 2 3 2 2
		console_command create_unit Eburonum "barb infantry gaul" 2 2 2 2
		console_command create_unit Eburonum "barb peltast gaul" 1 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Eburonum "boii noble cavalry" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Eburonum "barb heavy cavalry" 2 1 2 2
console_command add_money spain, 40000
        spawn_army
            faction spain
            character Casticos, general, age 30, x 109, y 169
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit heavy warband, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit heavy warband, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb warguard gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul chief, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul Violent warriors, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb cavalry gaul, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb cavalry gaul, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
end
        set_counter Eburonum_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Iuvavum_undersiege

	and I_SettlementOwner Iuvavum = spain
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls general, 2 99,160
        set_counter Iuvavum_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls family, 2 99,160
        set_counter Iuvavum_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Iuvavum_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls family, 2 99,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile gauls general, 2 99,160
	set_counter Iuvavum_undersiege 0
end_if

if I_CompareCounter Iuvavum_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Iuvavum = spain
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans general, 2 99,160
        set_counter Iuvavum_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans family, 2 99,160
        set_counter Iuvavum_undersiege 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans family, 2 99,160
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans general, 2 99,160

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 99,160

	and I_SettlementOwner Iuvavum = spain

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile macedon family, 2 99,160

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 99,160

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_julii general, 2 99,160
	set_counter Iuvavum_undersiege 0

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Iuvavum
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Iuvavum_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Iuvavum = spain
	and I_FactionBesieged spain
    and I_CompareCounter Iuvavum_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Iuvavum "gaul chief" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Iuvavum "barb warguard gaul" 2 2 2 2
        console_command create_unit Iuvavum "barb naked fanatics gauls" 4 3 1 2
        console_command create_unit Iuvavum "heavy warband" 2 3 1 2
        console_command create_unit Iuvavum "warband sword gaul" 3 3 1 2
		console_command create_unit Iuvavum "barb peltast gaul" 2 2 1 2
		console_command create_unit Iuvavum "barb infantry gaul" 4 2 1 2
        console_command create_unit Iuvavum "barb heavy cavalry" 2 1 2 2
        console_command add_money spain, 20000
        
if I_NumberOfSettlements spain < 5
    console_command kill_character "Casticos"
        spawn_army
            faction spain
            character Casticos, general, age 30, x 109, y 169
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit heavy warband, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit heavy warband, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb warguard gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul chief, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul Violent warriors, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb cavalry gaul, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb cavalry gaul, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
end
end_if
		set_counter Iuvavum_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Aquincum_undersiege

if I_CompareCounter Aquincum_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Aquincum = spain
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 118,158
		set_counter Aquincum_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 118,158
		set_counter Aquincum_undersiege 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 118,158
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 118,158
	set_counter Aquincum_undersiege 0
