	and I_SettlementOwner Aquincum = spain
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia general, 2 118,158
		set_counter Aquincum_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia family, 2 118,158
		set_counter Aquincum_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Aquincum_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia family, 2 118,158
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile scythia general, 2 118,158
	set_counter Aquincum_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Aquincum
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Aquincum_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Aquincum = spain
	and I_FactionBesieged spain
    and I_CompareCounter Aquincum_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Aquincum "gaul chief" 2 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Aquincum "barb warguard gaul" 2 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Aquincum "barb naked fanatics gauls" 2 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Aquincum "heavy warband" 2 2 1 1
        console_command create_unit Aquincum "barb heavy cavalry" 2 1 1 1
		console_command create_unit Aquincum "barb peltast gaul" 2 2 1 2
		console_command create_unit Aquincum "barb infantry gaul" 4 2 1 1
		console_command create_unit Aquincum "warband sword gaul" 2 2 1 1
        console_command add_money spain, 30000
if I_NumberOfSettlements spain < 5
    console_command kill_character "Casticos"
        spawn_army
            faction spain
            character Casticos, general, age 30, x 109, y 169
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit heavy warband, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit heavy warband, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb warguard gaul, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul chief, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit gaul Violent warriors, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb cavalry gaul, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit barb cavalry gaul, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
end
end_if
set_counter Aquincum_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

		console_command create_unit Leucaristus "barb infantry gaul" 2 2 1 1
		console_command create_unit Leucaristus "warband sword gaul" 2 2 1 1
        console_command create_unit Leucaristus "barb heavy cavalry" 2 2 1 1
        console_command create_unit Leucaristus "barb peltast gaul" 1 2 1 2
        console_command add_money spain, 30000

    console_command kill_character "Casticos"
        spawn_army
            faction spain

            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans family, 2 59,186

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans family, 2 59,186
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans general, 2 59,186

        console_command create_unit Avaricum "warband sword gaul" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Avaricum "barb peltast gaul" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Avaricum "barb infantry gaul" 2 1 2 2
        console_command add_money gauls, 40000
        spawn_army
            faction gauls 
            character Vercingetorix, general, age 30, x 55, y 158
            unit barb chieftain cavalry early gaul, exp 6 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 3
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb warguard gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband huntsman gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul chief, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul Violent warriors, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul bogaty, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy cavlry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb noble cavalry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
        spawn_army
            faction gauls 
            character Casticos, general, age 30, x 55, y 157
            unit barb chieftain cavalry early gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb peltast gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 3
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy infantry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb warguard gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband huntsman gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit warband sword gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb naked fanatics gauls, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul chief, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul Violent warriors, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul bogaty, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit gaul heavy cavlry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb heavy cavalry, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit barb noble cavalry gaul, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
end
        set_counter Avaricum_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Burdigala;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Burdigala_undersiege
set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 0
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType germans
if I_CompareCounter Burdigala_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Burdigala = gauls
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans general, 2 44,150
		set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans family, 2 44,150
		set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Burdigala_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans family, 2 44,150
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans general, 2 44,150
	set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType carthage
if I_CompareCounter Burdigala_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Burdigala = gauls
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 44,150
		set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 44,150
		set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Burdigala_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage family, 2 44,150
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile carthage general, 2 44,150
	set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType romans_scipii
if I_CompareCounter Burdigala_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Burdigala = gauls
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 44,150
		set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 44,150
		set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Burdigala_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 44,150
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 44,150
	set_counter Burdigala_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Burdigala
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Burdigala_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Burdigala = gauls
	and I_FactionBesieged gauls
    and I_CompareCounter Burdigala_undersiege = 1
        console_command create_unit Burdigala "gaul heavy infantry" 2 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Burdigala "barb naked fanatics gauls" 1 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Burdigala "heavy warband" 4 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Burdigala "warband sword gaul" 4 1 2 2
        console_command create_unit Burdigala "barb infantry gaul" 2 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Burdigala "barb peltast gaul" 2 0 2 2
        console_command add_money gauls, 30000
        set_counter Avaricum_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor

end_if
end_monitor

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile germans family, 2 56,165

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 74,165
		set_counter Vesontio_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 74,165
		set_counter Vesontio_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Vesontio_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 74,165
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 74,165
	set_counter Vesontio_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType spain
if I_CompareCounter Vesontio_undersiege = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Vesontio = gauls
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain general, 2 74,165
		set_counter Vesontio_undersiege 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain family, 2 74,165
		set_counter Vesontio_undersiege 1
	end_if
end_if
if I_CompareCounter Vesontio_undersiege = 2
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain family, 2 74,165
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile spain general, 2 74,165
	set_counter Vesontio_undersiege 0
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Vesontio
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Vesontio_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Vesontio = gauls
	and I_FactionBesieged gauls
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "heavy warband" 4 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb naked fanatics gauls" 4 2 2 1
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "warband sword gaul" 2 2 1 1
        console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb heavy cavalry" 1 1 2 3
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb peltast gaul" 1 2 1 2
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb infantry gaul" 3 2 1 1
        console_command add_money gauls, 40000
		set_counter Vesontio_undersiege 2
end_if
end_monitor
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Vesontio
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Vesontio_undersiege_germans = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Vesontio = gauls
	and I_FactionBesieged gauls
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "gaul bogaty" 2 1 2 2

        console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb naked fanatics gauls" 4 2 2 3
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb peltast gaul" 1 3 2 3

		console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb infantry gaul" 2 2 2 3
        console_command create_unit Vesontio "heavy warband" 3 3 2 3
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "warband sword gaul" 2 2 2 3
        console_command add_money gauls, 40000
        set_counter Vesontio_undersiege_germans 2
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter saba_emergency

    and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_brutii < 7
if I_CompareCounter saba_emergency = 0
	and I_SettlementOwner Carna = romans_brutii
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 2 244,35
        and I_FactionBesieged romans_brutii
		set_counter saba_emergency 1
	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 244,35
        and I_FactionBesieged romans_brutii
		set_counter saba_emergency 1
	end_if

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 244,35
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 2 244,35

end_if
end_monitor

        spawn_army

            unit east sabaean skirmisher, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 2
            unit sabeian axemen, exp 3 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

            unit arab infantry, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit arab infantry, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit arab infantry, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit sabeian axemen, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit sabeian axemen, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit east sabeian spearmen, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit east sabeian spearmen, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit parthian thureophoroi, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit parthian thureophoroi, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit parthian thureophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1

            unit east parthian cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
end

end_monitor

	end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 259,21
        set_counter Mariaba_undersiege 1

	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt family, 2 259,21
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 2 259,21

	set_counter Mariaba_undersiege 0

end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Mariaba
and not SettlementIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Mariaba_undersiege = 1
	if I_SettlementOwner Mariaba = romans_brutii
	and I_FactionBesieged romans_brutii
    and I_CompareCounter Mariaba_undersiege = 1
		set_counter Mariaba_undersiege 2
		console_command create_unit Mariaba "east sabeian spearmen" 2 2 1 2
		console_command create_unit Mariaba "arab infantry" 4 2 1 1
		console_command create_unit Mariaba "sabeian axemen" 5 2 1 1
		console_command create_unit Mariaba "parthian thureophoroi" 5 1 1 1
        console_command create_unit Mariaba "east sabaean cavalry" 2 2 2 1
        console_command add_money romans_brutii, 40000
if I_SettlementOwner Axum != romans_brutii
        spawn_army
            faction romans_brutii
            character Hasan, general, age 30, x 257, y 19
            unit east sabaean skirmisher, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east sabaean skirmisher, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 2

            unit sabeian axemen, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit east sabeian spearmen, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit east sabeian spearmen, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit parthian thureophoroi, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit parthian thureophoroi, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit parthian thureophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
            unit parthian thureophoroi, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
            unit east parthian cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
            unit east parthian cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
end
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_brutii < 7
        spawn_army
            faction romans_brutii
            character Hasan, general, age 30, x 257, y 19
            unit east sabaean skirmisher, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 2
            unit east sabaean skirmisher, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 2

            unit arab infantry, exp 2 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1

            unit east parthian cavalry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
end

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Arretium
    and not SettlementIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber > 120
        and SettlementBuildingExists = army_barracks
        and not SettlementBuildingExists = national3
        console_command create_building Arretium "national3"
        terminate_monitor
    end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Ariminum
    and not SettlementIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber > 120
        and SettlementBuildingExists = army_barracks
        and not SettlementBuildingExists = national3
        console_command create_building Ariminum "national3"
        terminate_monitor
end_monitor

    and not SettlementIsLocal
        and I_TurnNumber > 120
        and SettlementBuildingExists = army_barracks
        and not SettlementBuildingExists = national3

;monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
;and I_TurnNumber = 20
;monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Roma
        ;and I_CompareCounter ScipioLegions = 0
        ;and SettlementBuildingExists = army_barracks
        ;set_counter ScipioLegions 1
        ;end_monitor
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionType romans_scipii
and I_CompareCounter ScipioLegions = 0
and I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Syracuse = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Lilybaeum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Saguntum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Carthago_Nova = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Emporion = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Messana = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Gadir = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Tingi = romans_scipii
set_counter ScipioLegions 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Marian Legions;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter MarianLegions
declare_counter CimbriInvasion
set_counter CimbriInvasion 0
set_counter MarianLegions 0
    ;monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_scipii
        ;and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 0
            ;if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 50
        ;set_counter MarianLegions 1
    ;end_if
;terminate_monitor     
;end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Pella
and SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
set_counter MarianLegions 1
end_monitor
    
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Capua
    and I_CompareCounter MarianLegions = 1
    and not SettlementBuildingExists = reform3
        console_command create_building Capua "reform3"
        console_command create_building Roma "reform3"
        console_command create_building Alexandria "reform3"

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Ceasar's Legions;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
;and I_TurnNumber = 280
declare_counter CeasarsLegions
set_counter CeasarsLegions 0
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
        and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 0
        if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 77
        set_counter CeasarsLegions 1
end_if
end_monitor

    and I_CompareCounter CeasarsLegions = 1
    and not SettlementBuildingExists = reform4

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Octavian August legions;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Augustlegions
set_counter Augustlegions 0
;monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionIsLocal
;and I_TurnNumber = 350
    monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_scipii
        and I_CompareCounter Augustlegions = 0
        if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 110
        set_counter Augustlegions 1
    end_if
end_monitor

and not SettlementIsLocal
and not SettlementBuildingExists = satrapy
and not SettlementBuildingExists = pahlevani_rituals
if I_SettlementOwner Bactra = parthia
console_command create_building Bactra "satrapy"
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

console_command add_population Ancyra 4000
console_command add_population Ancyra 1000
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = pontus
console_command add_population Nicomedia 4000
console_command add_population Nicomedia 4000
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Apameia = pontus
console_command add_population Apameia 4000
console_command add_population Apameia 4000
end_if
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction spain
and not I_LocalFaction germans
and not I_LocalFaction dacia
console_command add_population Vicus_Eravisci 4000
console_command add_population Vicus_Eravisci 4000
console_command add_population Aquincum 4000
console_command add_population Aquincum 4000
console_command add_population Leucaristus 4000
console_command add_population Leucaristus 4000
if I_SettlementOwner Sarmizegetusa = dacia
console_command add_population Sarmizegetusa 4000
console_command add_population Sarmizegetusa 4000
end_if
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction germans
and not I_LocalFaction gauls
console_command add_population Mattium 4000
console_command add_population Mattium 4000
console_command add_population Phabiranum 4000
console_command add_population Phabiranum 4000
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction gauls
console_command add_population Samarobriva 4000
console_command add_population Samarobriva 4000
console_command add_population Cenabum 4000
console_command add_population Cenabum 4000
console_command add_population Vienna 4000
console_command add_population Vienna 4000

console_command add_population Vesontio 4000
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction macedon
and not I_LocalFaction thrace
and not I_LocalFaction dacia
console_command add_population Sardica 4000
console_command add_population Sardica 4000
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction macedon
and not I_LocalFaction greek_cities
and not I_LocalFaction numidia
and not I_LocalFaction thrace
console_command add_population Apollonia 4000
console_command add_population Apollonia 4000

end_monitor

    ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;peace with the dead;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

    monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
        and I_NumberOfSettlements  romans_scipii = 0
        console_command diplomatic_stance romans_julii romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance romans_brutii romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance macedon romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance seleucid romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance britons romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance egypt romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance carthage romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance gauls romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance spain romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance thrace romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance scythia romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance parthia romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance armenia romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance pontus romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance dacia romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance numidia romans_scipii neutral
        console_command diplomatic_stance roman_rebels romans_scipii neutral
        terminate_monitor
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;diplomatic stance;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
if I_SettlementOwner Messana = numidia
and not I_LocalFaction carthage
and not I_LocalFaction numidia
and I_NumberOfSettlements carthage > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance carthage numidia War
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements carthage = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements numidia = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
if I_SettlementOwner Tanais = scythia
and not I_LocalFaction romans_julii
and not I_LocalFaction Scythia
and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance romans_julii scythia War
console_command diplomatic_stance romans_julii scythia War
console_command add_population Tanais 600
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements scythia = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_julii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor
;;;;;;;;;;;;PONTUS;;;;;;;;
declare_counter pontus_resist
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
if not I_LocalFaction pontus
and I_NumberOfSettlements pontus > 0
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = greek_cities
and not I_LocalFaction greek_cities
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus greek_cities War
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus greek_cities War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = britons
and not I_LocalFaction britons
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus britons War
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus britons War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Tarsus = seleucid
and not I_LocalFaction seleucid
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus seleucid War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = thrace
and not I_LocalFaction thrace
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus thrace War
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus thrace War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = macedon
and not I_LocalFaction macedon
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus macedon War
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus macedon War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = numidia
and not I_LocalFaction numidia
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus numidia War
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus numidia War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = seleucid
and not I_LocalFaction seleucid
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus seleucid War
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus seleucid War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = dacia
and not I_LocalFaction dacia
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus dacia War
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus dacia War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = pontus
and I_SettlementOwner Tarsus != pontus
and not I_LocalFaction thrace
and I_NumberOfSettlements thrace > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus thrace neutral
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = pontus
and I_SettlementOwner Side != pontus
and not I_LocalFaction thrace
and I_NumberOfSettlements thrace > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus thrace neutral
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Tarsus = pontus
and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = egypt
and not I_LocalFaction egypt
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus egypt War
console_command diplomatic_stance egypt pontus War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Tarsus = egypt
and not I_LocalFaction egypt
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus egypt War
console_command diplomatic_stance pontus egypt War
end_if

console_command diplomatic_stance pontus egypt War

declare_counter parthia_resist

monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
if I_SettlementOwner Seleucia = seleucid
and not I_LocalFaction seleucid

and not I_LocalFaction parthia
and not I_LocalFaction roman_rebels
and I_SettlementOwner Merv = roman_rebels
console_command diplomatic_stance parthia roman_rebels War
console_command diplomatic_stance parthia roman_rebels War
end_if

if I_NumberOfSettlements parthia > 0
and not I_LocalFaction parthia
	if I_SettlementOwner Khiva = roman_rebels
    and not I_LocalFaction roman_rebels
	console_command diplomatic_stance parthia roman_rebels War
    console_command add_money parthia, 40000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1
	end_if
	if I_SettlementOwner Asaak = roman_rebels
    and not I_LocalFaction roman_rebels
	console_command diplomatic_stance parthia roman_rebels War
    console_command add_money parthia, 40000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1
	end_if

    end_if

    and not I_LocalFaction roman_rebels
	console_command diplomatic_stance parthia roman_rebels War
	console_command add_money parthia, 30000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1
	end_if
    
    if I_SettlementOwner Khiva = seleucid
    and not I_LocalFaction seleucid
	console_command diplomatic_stance parthia seleucid War
    console_command add_money parthia, 40000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1

    console_command add_money parthia, 40000
    console_command add_money seleucid, -40000

    set_counter parthia_resist 1
	end_if

    and I_SettlementOwner Hecatompylos = seleucid
    console_command diplomatic_stance parthia seleucid War
    console_command add_money parthia, 40000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1
    end_if
	if not I_LocalFaction seleucid
    and I_SettlementOwner Khiva = seleucid
    console_command diplomatic_stance parthia seleucid War
    console_command add_money parthia, 40000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1
    end_if
	if not I_LocalFaction seleucid
    and I_SettlementOwner Istakhr = seleucid
    console_command diplomatic_stance parthia seleucid War
    console_command add_money parthia, 40000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1
	end_if
	if not I_LocalFaction seleucid
    and I_SettlementOwner Tabae = seleucid
    console_command diplomatic_stance parthia seleucid War
    console_command add_money parthia, 40000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1
    end_if
    if I_SettlementOwner Zadracarta = seleucid
    and not I_LocalFaction seleucid
	console_command diplomatic_stance parthia roman_rebels War
	console_command add_money parthia, 30000
    set_counter parthia_resist 1
    end_if

    if I_CompareCounter parthia_resist = 1
        console_command add_money parthia, 40000
		if I_SettlementOwner Zadracarta = parthia
        console_command add_population Zadracarta 600
    	end_if
    	if I_SettlementOwner Hecatompylos = parthia
        console_command add_population Hecatompylos 600
    	end_if
    	if I_SettlementOwner Asaak = parthia
        console_command add_population Asaak 400
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Apamea = parthia
        console_command add_population Apamea 600
        end_if
   		if I_SettlementOwner Istakhr = parthia
		console_command add_population Istakhr 500
		end_if
	    if I_SettlementOwner Tabae = parthia
		console_command add_population Tabae 600
		end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Susa = parthia
		console_command add_population Susa 600
		end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Khiva = parthia
		console_command add_population Khiva 300
        end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Nisa = parthia
		console_command add_population Nisa 300
		end_if
    end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nisa = parthia
and I_SettlementOwner Khiva = parthia
and I_SettlementOwner Asaak = parthia
and I_SettlementOwner Hecatompylos = parthia
and I_SettlementOwner Tabae = parthia
and I_SettlementOwner Istakhr = parthia
and I_SettlementOwner Susa = parthia
and I_SettlementOwner Zadracarta = parthia
set_counter parthia_resist 0
end_if
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements parthia = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

	console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities egypt War
    end_if
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile egypt general, 2 154,113
    console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities egypt War
    end_if

    end_if

    end_if

    end_if

    end_if

	console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities macedon War
    end_if

    console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities pontus War
    end_if
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia family, 2 154,113
	console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities numidia War
    end_if
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile numidia general, 2 154,113
    console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities numidia War
    end_if
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace family, 2 154,113
	console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities thrace War
    end_if
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile thrace general, 2 154,113
    console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities thrace War
    end_if
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons general, 2 154,113
    console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities britons War
    end_if
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile britons family, 2 154,113
	console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities britons War
    end_if
end_if

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 161,101
    console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities romans_scipii War
    end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 161,101

    end_if

        end_if

        end_if

    and not I_LocalFaction romans_julii

        end_if
	end_if

	and not I_LocalFaction pontus

    console_command add_money thrace, 25000
    	if I_SettlementOwner Seutopolis = thrace
        console_command add_population Seutopolis 600
    	end_if
    	if I_SettlementOwner Tomi = thrace

        end_if

    if I_CompareCounter dacia_resist = 1
        if I_SettlementOwner Buridava = dacia
        console_command add_population Buridava 600
        end_if
    	if I_SettlementOwner Naissus = dacia

        console_command add_population Docidava 500
    	end_if
        if I_SettlementOwner Sarmizegetusa = dacia
        console_command add_population Sarmizegetusa 600
    	end_if
    end_if
	if I_CompareCounter dacia_resist = 1
	and I_SettlementOwner Buridava = dacia
    and I_SettlementOwner Vicus_Eravisci = dacia
	and I_SettlementOwner Docidava = dacia
    and I_SettlementOwner Sarmizegetusa = dacia
    set_counter dacia_resist 0
    end_if
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements dacia = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;SCYTHIA;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

if I_NumberOfSettlements scythia > 0
	and not I_LocalFaction scythia
	if not I_LocalFaction spain
		if I_SettlementOwner Vicus_Tissagetae = spain

		console_command add_population Vicus_Tissagetae 4000

		console_command add_money scythia, 40000

		end_if

		console_command diplomatic_stance scythia spain War
		console_command add_population Campus_Iazyges 4000
		console_command add_population Campus_Iazyges 4000

		console_command add_population Campus_Iazyges 4000
		console_command add_money scythia, 40000
        set_counter scythia_resist 1
		end_if
	end_if
	if not I_LocalFaction thrace
		and I_SettlementOwner Campus_Iazyges = thrace

		console_command add_money scythia, 40000
        set_counter scythia_resist 1
		end_if
    end_if
if I_CompareCounter scythia_resist = 1
if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Roxolani = scythia
console_command add_population Campus_Roxolani 500
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Vicus_Tissagetae = scythia
console_command add_population Vicus_Tissagetae 500 
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Siracae = scythia

end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Massagetae = scythia
console_command add_population Campus_Massagetae 500
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Aorsi = scythia
console_command add_population Campus_Aorsi 500
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Iirkai = scythia
console_command add_population Campus_Iirkai 500 
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Iazyges = scythia
console_command add_population Campus_Iazyges 500
end_if
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Campus_Siracae = scythia
and I_SettlementOwner Campus_Massagetae = scythia
and I_SettlementOwner Campus_Iirkai = scythia
and I_SettlementOwner Campus_Aorsi = scythia
and I_SettlementOwner Campus_Roxolani = scythia
and I_SettlementOwner Campus_Iazyges = scythia
set_counter scythia_resist 0
end_if
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements scythia = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

    and I_SettlementOwner Alexandria = egypt
    
    and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 163,74
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 163,74
    
    and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 155,58
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 155,58
    
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 178,76
	and not I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 178,76

	console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii egypt neutral
	end_if

	if I_SettlementOwner Lepcis_Magna != egypt
	and I_SettlementOwner Garama != egypt
	and I_SettlementOwner Paraetonium = egypt
    and I_SettlementOwner Siwa = egypt
    and I_SettlementOwner Alexandria = egypt
    
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 163,74
    spawn_army 
    faction egypt
    		character Teos, general, age 30, x 163, y 71
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit egyptian nile infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit egyptian cleruch, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        	end

    end_if
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 163,74
    spawn_army 
    faction egypt
    		character Teos, general, age 30, x 163, y 71
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1

			unit egyptian cleruch, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
        	end 
    console_command diplomatic_stance egypt romans_scipii War
	end_if

    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 155,58
    spawn_army 
    faction egypt
    		character Teos, general, age 30, x 158, y 58
			unit thureos spears, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
			unit egyptian nile infantry, exp 3 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1

        	end

    end_if  
	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 155,58

end_if
end_monitor

if not I_LocalFaction gauls
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
and I_SettlementOwner Massilia = gauls

console_command diplomatic_stance gauls romans_scipii War
end_if

and I_SettlementOwner Oxtraca = gauls
console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii gauls War
console_command diplomatic_stance gauls romans_scipii War
end_if
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements gauls = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

		end_if

	if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii family, 2 146,94
	console_command diplomatic_stance numidia romans_scipii War
    end_if
    if I_CharacterTypeNearTile romans_scipii general, 2 146,94
    console_command diplomatic_stance numidia romans_scipii War
    end_if

	console_command diplomatic_stance numidia egypt War
    end_if

    console_command diplomatic_stance numidia egypt War
    end_if

	console_command diplomatic_stance numidia seleucid War

and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction spain = AtWar
if I_CompareCounter gallic_war = 0
and not I_LocalFaction spain
and not I_LocalFaction macedon
and I_NumberOfSettlements macedon > 0
and I_SettlementOwner Segestica != spain
and I_SettlementOwner Scodra != spain

and I_SettlementOwner Aquincum != romans_scipii

end_if
end_monitor

    console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii neutral

declare_counter Bactria_resist
monitor_event FactionTurnEnd FactionIsLocal
if not I_LocalFaction roman_rebels
and I_NumberOfSettlements roman_rebels > 0
if I_SettlementOwner Alexandria_Ariana = parthia 
and not I_LocalFaction parthia 
    spawn_army 
    faction roman_rebels
    character Demetrius, general, age 29, x 324, y 147
    unit BAKTRIAN NOBLES, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
	unit thureos swordsmen, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
    unit thureos spears, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
    unit thureos spears, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
    unit parthian takabara, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
    unit east peltast, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
    unit eastern cavalry, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
end
console_command add_money roman_rebels, 10000
set_counter Bactria_resist 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Alexandria_Oxiana = parthia
and not I_LocalFaction parthia

    character Demetrius, general, age 29, x 324, y 148

    unit eastern cavalry, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_scipii
and not FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter conquering_greece = 0
	if I_NumberOfSettlements gauls > 0
	and not I_LocalFaction gauls
    and I_SettlementOwner Mediolanium = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Patavium = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Iuvavum != gauls
    and I_SettlementOwner Segestica != gauls
	and I_SettlementOwner Scodra != gauls
    and I_SettlementOwner Baikor != gauls
	and I_SettlementOwner Arsa != gauls
	and I_SettlementOwner Oxtraca != gauls
	console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii gauls Allied
	console_command diplomatic_stance gauls romans_scipii Allied
	end_if

    and not FactionIsLocal
    and not I_LocalFaction germans
 	and DiplomaticStanceFromFaction germans = AtWar

    and I_SettlementOwner Segestica != germans
    and I_SettlementOwner Aquincum != germans

    and I_SettlementOwner Vienna != germans

	console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii germans neutral

    and I_SettlementOwner Aquincum != germans

    and I_SettlementOwner Vienna != germans

	end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;CARTHAGE HAS BEEN DESTROYED;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Carthago
and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
if I_SettlementOwner Emporion = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Pallantia = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Saguntum = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Patavium = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Mediolanium = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Carthago_Nova = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Tingi = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Siga = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Hippo_Regius = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Cirta = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Hadrumetum = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Thapsus = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Carthago = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Lepcis_Magna = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
console_command create_building Carthago "monument_victory_minor"
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Second Punic War;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;HANNIBAL AT THE GATES;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
declare_counter Hannibal_invasion
set_counter Hannibal_invasion 0
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Arretium
and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
and I_TurnNumber > 20
if I_NumberOfSettlements carthage > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
and not I_LocalFaction carthage
and I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Ariminum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Capua = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Ancona = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Cannae = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Tarentum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Croton = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Messana = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Lilybaeum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Segesta = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Patavium = romans_scipii
set_counter Hannibal_invasion 1
end_if
if I_LocalFaction carthage
and I_SettlementOwner Roma = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Messana = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Lilybaeum = romans_scipii
set_counter Hannibal_invasion 1
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements carthage = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

and not FactionIsLocal
and I_CompareCounter Hannibal_invasion = 1
;and I_TurnNumber = 44

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;Capua rebelion;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Capua
and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = carthage
set_counter Hannibal_invasion 2
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType carthage
        and not FactionIsLocal
        ;and I_TurnNumber = 48
        and I_CompareCounter Hannibal_invasion = 2
        and I_NumberOfSettlements carthage > 0
        and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
        and I_SettlementOwner Arretium = carthage
if I_SettlementOwner Capua = romans_scipii
console_command control carthage
		console_command capture_settlement Capua
		console_command create_unit Capua "merc barbarian cavalry" 3 4 2 2
		console_command create_unit Capua "samnite swordsman" 5 4 2 2
		console_command create_unit Capua "samnite swordsman" 5 4 2 2
        console_command create_unit Capua "samnite spearman" 5 5 2 2
        console_command create_unit Capua "samnite spearman" 2 5 2 2

    console_command kill_character "Lucius Aemilius"
        spawn_army
            faction romans_scipii 
            character Lucius Aemilius, named character, age 43, x 96, y 128
            unit roman generals guard cavalry early, exp 0 armour 1 weapon_lvl 1
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1
            unit roman hastati, exp 0 armour 2 weapon_lvl 1

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;second punic war Carthage user player;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType carthage
        and FactionIsLocal
        ;and I_TurnNumber > 40
        and I_CompareCounter Hannibal_invasion = 1
        and I_NumberOfSettlements carthage > 0
        and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
        console_command kill_character "Hannibal Barca"
        console_command add_money carthage, 40000
        spawn_army
            faction carthage
            character Hannibal Barca, named character, age 28, x 36, y 113
            unit carthaginian general's cavalry, exp 4 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            unit carthaginian peltast, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian slinger, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit spanish scutarii, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

            unit barb infantry gaul, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

            unit carthaginian legionary, exp 2 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian legionary, exp 2 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2

            unit carthaginian medium infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2
            unit carthaginian medium infantry, exp 2 armour 2 weapon_lvl 2

            unit numidian cavalry, exp 2 armour 3 weapon_lvl 2

            spawn_army
            faction carthage
            character Maharbal Barca, named character, age 26, x 36, y 112
            unit carthaginian general's cavalry, exp 3 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
            end

        console_command give_trait "Hannibal Barca" GoodRiskyAttacker 1
        console_command give_trait "Hannibal Barca" GoodAdministrator 3

        console_command diplomatic_stance carthage romans_scipii War
        console_command create_building Arretium "monument_victory_minor"
        set_counter Hannibal_invasion 0
end_monitor

declare_counter conquering_greece
set_counter conquering_greece 0

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Carthago
and SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
set_counter conquering_greece 1
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Pella
and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor 
if I_CompareCounter conquering_greece = 1
		and I_SettlementOwner Segestica = romans_scipii
        and I_SettlementOwner Scodra = romans_scipii
        and I_SettlementOwner Pella = romans_scipii

end_if
end_monitor

and not FactionIsLocal
if I_SettlementOwner Iuvavum = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
console_command diplomatic_stance germans spain War
console_command add_money germans, 30000
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Vienna = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
console_command diplomatic_stance germans gaul War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Aquincum = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
console_command diplomatic_stance germans spain War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Segestica = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Massilia = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Patavium = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Mediolanium = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Segestica = germans
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii War
end_if

end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Iuvavum
and SettlementBuildingExists = reform3
and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
if I_SettlementOwner Iuvavum != germans
and I_SettlementOwner Mediolanium = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Patavium = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Tolosa = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Massilia = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Segestica = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Scodra = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Vienna != germans
console_command create_building Iuvavum "monument_victory_minor"
end_if
end_monitor

declare_counter Conquering_MinorAsia
set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 0

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Iuvavum
and SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
if I_SettlementOwner Sidon != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Antioch != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Tarsus != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Apameia != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Side != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Ancyra != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Heraclea != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Halicarnasus != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Rhodes != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Sardis != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Pergamum != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Assos != romans_scipii
    set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia != romans_scipii
	set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 1
end_if
terminate_monitor
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Antioch
and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
if I_SettlementOwner Sidon = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Tarsus = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Apameia = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Side = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Ancyra = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Heraclea = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Halicarnasus = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Rhodes = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Sardis = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Pergamum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Assos = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = romans_scipii
console_command create_building "monument_victory_minor"
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Antioch
and SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
if I_CompareCounter gallic_war = 0
and I_SettlementOwner Sidon = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Tarsus = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Apameia = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Side = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Ancyra = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Heraclea = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Halicarnasus = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Rhodes = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Sardis = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Pergamum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Assos = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = romans_scipii
if I_NumberOfSettlements pontus > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
and not I_LocalFaction pontus
console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii pontus neutral
end_if
if I_NumberOfSettlements egypt > 0
and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 0
and not I_LocalFaction egypt
and I_CompareCounter Egypt_Conquering = 0
and I_CompareCounter Conquering_MinorAsia = 0
and I_SettlementOwner Lepcis_Magna != egypt
and I_SettlementOwner Garama != egypt
and I_SettlementOwner Sidon != egypt
and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = egypt
and I_SettlementOwner Side != egypt
and I_SettlementOwner Halicarnasus != egypt
and I_SettlementOwner Rhodes != egypt
console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii egypt Allied
end_if

set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia_start 0
set_counter Conquering_MinorAsia 0
end_if
end_monitor

end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Assos = roman_rebels
    console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii roman_rebels War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = roman_rebels
	console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii roman_rebels War
end_if
end_if

if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii = 0
terminate_monitor
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;5 Gallic war ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

                  ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
                  ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AI PLAYER;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
                  ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

declare_counter gallic_war
set_counter gallic_war 0
monitor_event SettlementTurnEnd SettlementName Avaricum
and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
and I_CompareCounter gallic_war = 0
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 65
    and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Tarsus = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Apameia = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Side = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Ancyra = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Heraclea = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Halicarnasus = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Sardis = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Pergamum = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Assos = romans_scipii
	and I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Arsa = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Oxtraca = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Gadir = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Darioritum != romans_scipii
    set_counter gallic_war 1
end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event FactionTurnStart FactionType romans_scipii
    and not FactionIsLocal
    and I_CompareCounter gallic_war = 1
    if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 65
    and I_SettlementOwner Pergamum = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Assos = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Halicarnasus = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Ephesus = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Sardis = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Tarsus = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Side = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Antioch = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Nicomedia = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Apameia = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Arsa = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Oxtraca = romans_scipii
    and I_SettlementOwner Gadir = romans_scipii
    
if I_SettlementOwner Vesontio = germans
console_command control gauls
		console_command capture_settlement Vesontio
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb peltast gaul" 3 1 2 2
		console_command create_unit Vesontio "barb infantry gaul" 5 1 2 2

console_command kill_character "Gaius Julius"
spawn_army
faction romans_scipii
            character Gaius Julius, named character, age 43, x 55, y 140
			unit roman generals guard cavalry, exp 9 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			unit roman republican legion first, exp 6 armour 3 weapon_lvl 3
			end
console_command give_trait "Gaius Julius" GoodCommander 4
console_command give_trait "Gaius Julius" GoodRiskyAttacker 1
console_command give_trait "Gaius Julius" Consul
console_command give_ancillary "Gaius Julius" elder_senator
console_command give_ancillary "Gaius Julius" siege_engineer
console_command give_ancillary "Gaius Julius" priest_of_Jupiter

end_if
end_monitor

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Avaricum
and not SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
if I_SettlementOwner Gergovia = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Bibracte = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Lemonum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Avaricum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Cenabum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Darioritum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Samarobriva = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Vesontio = romans_scipii
console_command create_building Avaricum "monument_victory_minor"
end_if
end_monitor

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;6 Egypt Conquering ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

                  ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
                  ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;AI PLAYER;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
                  ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
                  
declare_counter Egypt_Conquering
set_counter Egypt_Conquering 0

monitor_event SettlementTurnStart SettlementName Avaricum
and SettlementBuildingExists = monument_victory_minor
set_counter Egypt_Conquering 1
if I_NumberOfSettlements romans_scipii > 77
and not I_LocalFaction romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Gergovia = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Bibracte = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Lemonum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Burdigala = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Avaricum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Cenabum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Darioritum = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Samarobriva = romans_scipii
and I_SettlementOwner Vesontio = romans_scipii
if I_SettlementOwner Memphis = egypt
console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii egypt War
end_if
if I_SettlementOwner Alexandria = egypt
console_command diplomatic_stance romans_scipii egypt War
end_if

if not I_LocalFaction greek_cities
and I_NumberOfSettlements greek_cities > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance greek_cities romans_scipii neutral
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction romans_brutii
and I_NumberOfSettlements romans_brutii > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance romans_brutii romans_scipii neutral
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction seleucid
and I_NumberOfSettlements seleucid > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance seleucid romans_scipii neutral
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction germans
and I_NumberOfSettlements germans > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance germans romans_scipii neutral
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction spain
and I_NumberOfSettlements spain > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance spain romans_scipii neutral
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction dacia
and I_NumberOfSettlements dacia > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance dacia romans_scipii neutral
end_if
if not I_LocalFaction numidia
and I_NumberOfSettlements numidia > 0
console_command diplomatic_stance numidia romans_scipii neutral
end_if

end_if
end_monitor

    suspend_unscripted_advice true
